35025.description: Their plumage is more beautiful than any other. Subtlety is for the birds! I mean... other birds. -Viera Sunwhisper
35025.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Winaestra
Zone: Eversong Woods
Cost: 10

35027.name: Swift Purple Hawkstrider
35027.description: Their plumage is more beautiful than any other. Subtlety is for the birds! I mean... other birds. -Viera Sunwhisper
35027.sourceDesc:

Zone: Eversong Woods
Cost: 10

35028.name: Swift Warstrider
35028.description: You watch what happens when their master is attacked and you will see those birds in a whole new light. - Raider Bork
35028.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Raider Bork
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 15

35710.description: Patient and strong, the Elekk exemplify the Draenei attitude towards the hardships of life.

36702.sourceDesc:

Location: Karazhan

37015.name: Swift Nether Drake
37015.description: The most aggressive nether drakes were awarded those heroes who showed significant prowess and commitment in the gladiatorial arena.

40192.name: Ashes of Al'ar
40192.description: Al'ar was the beloved pet of Kael'thas Sunstrider, who often boasted that death would never claim it. Perhaps he was right.
40192.sourceDesc:
Drop: Kael'thas Sunstrider
Location: The Eye, Tempest Keep

41252.name: Raven Lord
41252.description: The rest be forgotten to walk upon the ground, clipped wings and shame. -Word of the Raven

41513.name: Onyx Netherwing Drake
41513.description: After promising to fly you to the ends of Outland, the netherwing drake was eventually drawn to the blue skies of Azeroth as well.
41513.sourceDesc:
Quest: Onyxien the Onyx Netherwing Drake
Zone: Shattrath City, Outland

41514.name: Azure Netherwing Drake
41514.description: After promising to fly you to the ends of Outland, the netherwing drake was eventually drawn to the blue skies of Azeroth as well.
41514.sourceDesc:
Quest: Suraku the Azure Netherwing Drake
Zone: Shattrath City, Outland

41515.name: Cobalt Netherwing Drake
41515.description: After promising to fly you to the ends of Outland, the netherwing drake was eventually drawn to the blue skies of Azeroth as well.
41515.sourceDesc:
Quest: Jorus the Cobalt Netherwing Drake
Zone: Shattrath City, Outland

41516.name: Purple Netherwing Drake
41516.description: After promising to fly you to the ends of Outland, the netherwing drake was eventually drawn to the blue skies of Azeroth as well.
41516.sourceDesc:
Quest: Malfas the Purple Netherwing Drake
Zone: Shattrath City, Outland

41517.name: Veridian Netherwing Drake
41517.description: After promising to fly you to the ends of Outland, the netherwing drake was eventually drawn to the blue skies of Azeroth as well.
41517.sourceDesc:
Quest: Zoya the Veridian Netherwing Drake
Zone: Shattrath City, Outland

41518.name: Violet Netherwing Drake
41518.description: After promising to fly you to the ends of Outland, the netherwing drake was eventually drawn to the blue skies of Azeroth as well.
41518.sourceDesc:
Quest: Voranaku the Violet Netherwing Drake
Zone: Shattrath City, Outland

42776.name: Spectral Tiger
42776.description: In true goblin fashion, Landro Longshot has put a stranglehold on the distribution of these mysterious incorporeal mounts.
42776.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

42777.name: Swift Spectral Tiger
42777.description: Historians claim that these incorporeal beasts were created when Draenor exploded, unleashing energies that warped the world's flora and fauna.
42777.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

43688.name: Amani War Bear
43688.description: Only the swiftest heroes venturing into the troll temple of Zul'Aman were able to subdue these rare battle mounts.

43899.name: Brewfest Ram
43899.description: Brewers retired this mount from active advertising service after complaints that the beasts were "too temperamental" to control in major cities.

43900.name: Swift Brewfest Ram
43900.description: Dwarves attribute this breed's even temperament to rigorous training, but other races argue that a daily diet of strong ale has something to do with it.
43900.sourceDesc:
Drop: Keg-Shaped Treasure Chest
Holiday: Brewfest

43927.name: Cenarion War Hippogryph
43927.description: Members of the Cenarion Circle have shared a long and prosperous partnership with their hippogryph allies. When conflict is unavoidable, the Cenarion War Hippogryph is called into service.
43927.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Fedryen Swiftspear
Zone: Zangarmarsh, Outland
Faction: Cenarion Expedition - Exalted
Cost: 2000

44151.name: Turbo-Charged Flying Machine
44151.description: Only the most talented engineers have the courage and the mental stamina to create a flying machine that boasts stability and safety.  Turbo-charging one is just crazy!

44153.name: Flying Machine
44153.description: The backbone of the Alliance air force is comprised predominantly of gnomish flying machines due to their maneuverability and speed.

44744.name: Merciless Nether Drake
44744.description: The most aggressive nether drakes were awarded those heroes who showed significant prowess and commitment in the gladiatorial arena.

46197.name: X-51 Nether-Rocket
46197.description: First designed as a booster for a much larger rocket, the X-51 was determined to give the perfect thrust capacity for a single rider payload.
46197.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

46199.name: X-51 Nether-Rocket X-TREME
46199.description: What it lacks in safety features it more than makes up for in speed and style.  Not for the faint of heart.
46199.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

46628.name: Swift White Hawkstrider
46628.description: I may question Prince Kael'thas's loyalties, but never his style. -Elrodan
46628.sourceDesc:
Drop: Kael'thas Sunstrider
Zone: Magisters' Terrace

48025.name: Headless Horseman's Mount
48025.description: Be it into the flood, or into the fire, this one will go where you require.
48025.sourceDesc:
Drop: Loot-Filled Pumpkin
Holiday: Hallow's End

48027.name: Black War Elekk
48027.description: Uniquely aggressive and pugnacious elekk bulls are culled from the herd and sold to Ethereal traders. The traders then train the bulls for combat and sell them to owners unconcerned about safety.
48027.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Lieutenant Karter
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 15

48778.name: Acherus Deathcharger
48778.description: Some horses merely adopt the dark. This horse was born in it, molded by it.

49193.name: Vengeful Nether Drake
49193.description: The most aggressive nether drakes were awarded those heroes who showed significant prowess and commitment in the gladiatorial arena.

49322.name: Swift Zhevra
49322.description: Zhevras are rarely used as mounts in Azeroth due to their stubborn nature and tendency to bite.

49378.name: Brewfest Riding Kodo
49378.description: You can't remember exactly how you got this mount. Then again, you can't remember much of anything that happens at Brewfest.

49379.name: Great Brewfest Kodo
49379.description: Coren Direbrew won this prize after drinking a Tauren druid under the table - and the druid was in bear form. It was one of Direbrew's proudest moments.
49379.sourceDesc:
Drop: Keg-Shaped Treasure Chest
Holiday: Brewfest

51412.name: Big Battle Bear
51412.description: He's big, he's ready for battle, and he's a bear. What more could you want in a mount?
51412.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

54729.name: Winged Steed of the Ebon Blade
54729.description: Dead or alive, you're coming with me.
54729.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Dread Commander Thalanor
Zone: Eastern Plaguelands
Cost: 1000

54753.name: White Polar Bear
54753.description: The frost vrykul believe that wearing a necklace of polar bear claws will grant them otherworldly strength.
54753.sourceDesc:
Drop: Hyldnir Spoils
Location: The Storm Peaks

55164.name: Swift Spectral Gryphon
55164.description: Even the dead need a lift every now and then.

55531.name: Mechano-Hog
55531.description: Difficult to build and to maintain, these hogs more than make up for their expense through sheer cool factor.

58615.name: Brutal Nether Drake
58615.description: The most aggressive nether drakes were awarded those heroes who showed significant prowess and commitment in the gladiatorial arena.

58983.name: Big Blizzard Bear
58983.description: Whenever you ride this mount, you feel the urge to shout, "Cry havoc and let slip the murlocs of war!"

59567.name: Azure Drake
59567.description: Always speak politely to an enraged dragon.
59567.sourceDesc:
Drop: Alexstrasza's Gift
Location: Eye of Eternity

59568.name: Blue Drake
59568.description: Come not between the dragon and his wrath.
59568.sourceDesc:
Drop: Alexstrasza's Gift
Location: Eye of Eternity

59569.name: Bronze Drake
59569.description: Lost time is never found again. Oh, never mind I found it. -Chronormu
59569.sourceDesc:
Drop: Infinite Corruptor
Zone: The Culling of Stratholme

59570.name: Red Drake
59570.description: You should never listen to minstrels' fancies. A dragon would never hurt a soul, unless they tried to hurt him first.
59570.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Cielstrasza
Zone: Dragonblight
Faction: The Wyrmrest Accord - Exalted
Cost: 2000

59571.name: Twilight Drake
59571.description: But the most important rule, the rule you can never forget, no matter how much he cries, no matter how much he begs, never feed him after midnight.
59571.sourceDesc:
Drop: Sartharion
Location: The Obsidian Sanctum

59572.name: Black Polar Bear
59572.description: The taunka use black polar bear pelts in their religious rites, usually at the funerals of those who hunt black polar bears.

59650.name: Black Drake
59650.description: It never pays to leave a live dragon out of the equation.

59785.name: Black War Mammoth
59785.description: Normally placid beasts, these intelligent animals form a strong bond with their riders, making them loyal and fearless in battle.
59785.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Knight Dameron
Zone: Wintergrasp
Cost: 15

59788.name: Black War Mammoth
59788.description: Sure-footed and unflappable, these dark-furred mammoths are prized for their steady temperament going into battle.
59788.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Stone Guard Mukar
Zone: Wintergrasp
Cost: 15

59791.name: Wooly Mammoth
59791.description: Directly descended from the original progenitor of the mammoth race, wooly mammoths are considered more feral and primal than their shorter-haired cousins.
59791.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Mei Francis
Zone: Crystalsong Forest
Cost: 10000

59793.name: Wooly Mammoth
59793.description: This wild variant of the mammoth is not bred for riding. Most wooly mammoths are captured in the wild and tamed by their riders, resulting in a fierce, cunning mount.
59793.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Mei Francis
Zone: Crystalsong Forest
Cost: 10000

59797.name: Ice Mammoth
59797.description: The Sons of Hodir believe that riding an ice-white mammoth will protect the rider from frostbite and snow blindness.
59797.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Lillehoff
Zone: The Storm Peaks
Faction: The Sons of Hodir - Revered
Cost: 1000

59799.name: Ice Mammoth
59799.description: Many ice giants claim that they have trained their favored white mammoths to trigger avalanches with their trumpeting calls.
59799.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Lillehoff
Zone: The Storm Peaks
Faction: The Sons of Hodir - Revered
Cost: 1000

59961.name: Red Proto-Drake
59961.description: The vrykul were the first to recognize their potential. Or maybe the second, depending on how you look at it.
59961.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Hero
Category: Dungeons & Raids

59976.name: Black Proto-Drake
59976.description: Bred specifically to honor those heroes who showed exceptional resilience and fortitude facing the dangers in Northrend.

59996.name: Blue Proto-Drake
59996.description: The Storm Peaks! There we will find the beast strong enough to bear me into battle. -Skadi the Ruthless
59996.sourceDesc:
Drop: Skadi the Ruthless
Zone: Utgarde Pinnacle

60002.name: Time-Lost Proto-Drake
60002.description: The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once.
60002.sourceDesc:
Drop: Time-Lost Proto-Drake
Zone: The Storm Peaks

60021.name: Plagued Proto-Drake
60021.description: Bred specifically to honor those heroes who showed significant courage and persistence facing the dangers in Northrend.

60024.name: Violet Proto-Drake
60024.description: I cannot help but wonder if things would have turned out different if the titans had elevated even one more dragonflight. -Alexstrasza
60024.sourceDesc:
Achievement: What a Long, Strange Trip It's Been
Category: World Events

60025.name: Albino Drake
60025.description: Even the Draconic Native Association tests proved inconclusive in determining if the albino drake is related to a known dragonflight. -Breanni
60025.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Leading the Cavalry
Category: General

60114.name: Armored Brown Bear
60114.description: This ursine mount's swiftness is enhanced by its heavy armor, imbued with magic from Kirin Tor magi.
60114.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Mei Francis
Zone: Crystalsong Forest
Cost: 750

60116.name: Armored Brown Bear
60116.description: Your cries of "For the Horde!" will be much more menacing from atop a heavily armored bear that's barreling down on Alliance at top speed.
60116.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Mei Francis
Zone: Crystalsong Forest
Cost: 750

60118.name: Black War Bear
60118.description: Killing leaders of the Horde is its own reward, but this intimidating beast is an excellent memento.
60118.sourceDesc:
Achievement: For The Alliance!
Category: Player vs. Player

60119.name: Black War Bear
60119.description: This formidable mount is bought with the blood of Alliance leaders, but you would have killed them for free.
60119.sourceDesc:
Achievement: For The Horde!
Category: Player vs. Player

60136.name: Grand Caravan Mammoth
60136.description: Merchants trust only this thundering, mountainous steed to protect them when venturing down Azeroth's most dangerous trade routes.

60140.name: Grand Caravan Mammoth
60140.description: A common sight on trade routes all across Azeroth, this calm, stalwart mount is the favorite of merchants traveling to exotic and distant markets.

60424.name: Mekgineer's Chopper
60424.description: Sporting superb engineering craftsmanship, this chopper is one of the few personal vehicles on Azeroth built for two.

61229.name: Armored Snowy Gryphon
61229.description: The nice thing is that when they attack, blood almost never stains their feathers. -Mei Francis
61229.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Mei Francis
Zone: Crystalsong Forest
Cost: 2000

61230.name: Armored Blue Wind Rider
61230.description: They are not native to Northrend, but they have adapted extremely well to the cold. -Mei Francis
61230.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Mei Francis
Zone: Crystalsong Forest
Cost: 2000

61294.name: Green Proto-Drake
61294.description: The vrykul were the first to recognize their potential. Or maybe the second, depending on how you look at it.

61309.name: Magnificent Flying Carpet
61309.description: Standard features include a sturdy imbued frostweave frame and real iceweb spider silk threading.  Spare head pillow sold separately.

61425.name: Traveler's Tundra Mammoth
61425.description: Ancient manuscripts depict merchants traveling across the frozen tundra with these colossal beasts, leading scholars to believe they are the first domesticated mounts.
61425.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Mei Francis
Zone: Crystalsong Forest
Cost: 20000

61447.name: Traveler's Tundra Mammoth
61447.description: Riders and merchants alike trust only this strong and steadfast mammoth to carry them safely across the frigid tundra.
61447.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Mei Francis
Zone: Crystalsong Forest
Cost: 20000

61451.name: Flying Carpet
61451.description: Hop aboard this flying carpet to see the shining, shimmering, and splendid world of Azeroth, wonder by wonder.

61465.name: Grand Black War Mammoth
61465.description: Once used by giants to carry heavily armored warriors, these grand war mammoths can easily bear more than one rider of less-than-giant stature.
61465.sourceDesc:
Drop: Boss Drop
Location: Vault of Archavon

61467.name: Grand Black War Mammoth
61467.description: Rarely, a war mammoth is born stronger and more tractable than its peers. These mammoths are dubbed "grand" and carry more than one rider to the front lines.
61467.sourceDesc:
Drop: Boss Drop
Location: Vault of Archavon

61469.name: Grand Ice Mammoth
61469.description: At home on the narrow, icy trails of the Storm Peaks, these mammoths are the only mounts the ice giants trust to carry large loads and multiple riders.
61469.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Lillehoff
Zone: The Storm Peaks
Faction: The Sons of Hodir - Exalted
Cost: 10000

61470.name: Grand Ice Mammoth
61470.description: Due to high winds and avalanches, the Sons of Hodir recommend bringing at least two companions if venturing into the dangerous Storm Peaks.
61470.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Lillehoff
Zone: The Storm Peaks
Faction: The Sons of Hodir - Exalted
Cost: 10000

61996.name: Blue Dragonhawk
61996.description: Dragonhawks are among the deadliest known predators. They are able to spot prey from great distances, rush in, and rend with both talon and beak.
61996.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Mountain o' Mounts
Category: General

61997.name: Red Dragonhawk
61997.description: Dragonhawks are among the deadliest known predators. They are able to spot prey from great distances, rush in, and rend with both talon and beak.
61997.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Mountain o' Mounts
Category: General

62048.name: Illidari Doomhawk
62048.description: Once a year, a rift in time appears, and strange things occur. The Illidari scouts and Doomwalker were quite surprised to find themselves in Tanaris.

63232.name: Stormwind Steed
63232.description: Although raised in Stormwind, this breed showed unusual aptitude for the cold weather in Icecrown.
63232.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Corporal Arthur Flew
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 100

63635.name: Darkspear Raptor
63635.description: This raptor breed was originally cultivated by the Drakkari, but has since been adopted by the Darkspear tribe in Northrend.
63635.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Samamba
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 100

63636.name: Ironforge Ram
63636.description: Wildhammer Fact Checker claims that this specific breed was the first type of ram domesticated by the dwarves when they settled in Dun Morogh.
63636.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Derrick Brindlebeard
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 100

63637.name: Darnassian Nightsaber
63637.description: When a night elf's mount perishes, it is custom for the rider to keep one of the saber's great fangs as a token of remembrance.
63637.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Rook Hawkfist
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 100

63638.name: Gnomeregan Mechanostrider
63638.description: When you absolutely, positively have to be there right now. -Rillie Spindlenut
63638.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Rillie Spindlenut
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 100

63639.name: Exodar Elekk
63639.description: Exodar Elekk are elekk which have been anointed by O'ros, the Naaru who journeyed from Draenor to Azeroth with Velen and his followers.
63639.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Irisee
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 100

63640.name: Orgrimmar Wolf
63640.description: For a brief time, many orcs would declare themselves "hungry like an Orgrimmar wolf." Some blood elves still use the phrase ironically.
63640.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Freka Bloodaxe
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 100

63641.name: Thunder Bluff Kodo
63641.description: An alpha member of the herd, this kodo is a prime example of the mighty creatures which thunder through Mulgore.
63641.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Doru Thunderhorn
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 100

63642.name: Silvermoon Hawkstrider
63642.description: So I says I feel like chicken tonight. Next thing, I am flat out and that thing is trying to see what my eyes taste like. -Bozzle Blastbolt
63642.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Trellis Morningsun
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 100

63643.name: Forsaken Warhorse
63643.description: When fallen heroes are raised into undeath, so too are their horses.
63643.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Eliza Killian
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 100

63796.name: Mimiron's Head
63796.description: A token of titan craftsmanship hoarded by the Old God, Yogg-Saron. Currently the single largest mechanical gnome head in Azeroth.

63844.name: Argent Hippogryph
63844.description: Argent Hippogryphs will partner with only the bravest and most battle-tested champions.
63844.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Faction Quartermasters
Location: Argent Tournament, Icecrown
Cost: 150

63956.name: Ironbound Proto-Drake
63956.description: His skin more hard than brass was found, that sword nor spear could pierce nor wound.
63956.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Ulduar Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

63963.name: Rusted Proto-Drake
63963.description: Not as shiny as the other one, but it's still a great find lads. Brann Bronzebeard
63963.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Ulduar Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

64656.name: Blue Skeletal Warhorse
64656.description: A rare sight. Most disappeared once Baron Rivendare ruled in Stratholme.

64657.name: White Kodo
64657.description: "The kodo is the backbone of our people. Wherever the Horde goes - in trade, settlement, or war - there you will find the mighty kodo." - Harb Clawhoof
64657.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Harb Clawhoof
Zone: Mulgore
Cost: 1

64658.name: Black Wolf
64658.description: Can howl loudly enough to be heard for miles.

64659.name: Venomhide Ravasaur
64659.description: You raised this thing from a scaly pup - Mor'vek would be so proud. But he'd still make you clean up the mess it made in the corner.
64659.sourceDesc:
Quest: They Grow Up So Fast
Zone: Un'Goro Crater

64731.name: Sea Turtle
64731.description: Often caught by fishermen at a young age, these mounts are much more comfortable in the water than they are on land.

64927.name: Deadly Gladiator's Frost Wyrm
64927.description: These reanimated vessels of destruction do not fear death; they dispense it.

64977.name: Black Skeletal Horse
64977.description: The Forsaken believe that without a purpose, even beasts of burden suffer in undeath.
64977.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Zachariah Post
Zone: Tirisfal Glades
Cost: 1

65439.name: Furious Gladiator's Frost Wyrm
65439.description: Some of Azeroth's mightiest dragons have been summoned across the veil between life and death to serve new masters with undying loyalty.

65637.name: Great Red Elekk
65637.description: Never seen in Nagrand, the first red elekk calves were born in Azeroth after the Exodar's arrival. Some breeders theorize that the unique coloration is somehow caused by the same radiation which ravaged Bloodmyst Isle.
65637.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Irisee
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 500

65638.name: Swift Moonsaber
65638.description: Many night elves revere these proud mounts because their shimmering coats symbolize the goddess of the moon, Elune.
65638.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Rook Hawkfist
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 500

65639.name: Swift Red Hawkstrider
65639.description: What do you mean is it dyed? Oh, the bird. We did touch up the red just a little. -Trellis Morningsun
65639.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Trellis Morningsun
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 500

65640.name: Swift Gray Steed
65640.description: A veteran of some of the toughest battles fought by the Argent Crusade.
65640.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Corporal Arthur Flew
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 500

65641.name: Great Golden Kodo
65641.description: An alpha member of the herd, this kodo is a prime example of the mighty creatures which thunder through the Southern Barrens.
65641.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Doru Thunderhorn
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 500

65642.name: Turbostrider
65642.description: The mirror's not so you can look back, but so your foes can see something besides your tailpipes. -Rillie Spindlenut
65642.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Rillie Spindlenut
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 500

65643.name: Swift Violet Ram
65643.description: The Barak Tor'ol ram's thick bony skull and massive horns make it the ideal mount for charging through groups of armored enemies.
65643.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Derrick Brindlebeard
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 500

65644.name: Swift Purple Raptor
65644.description: Longtime allies of the trolls, these jungle hunters form a special bond with their masters. They become mount, guardian, and friend.
65644.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Samamba
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 500

65645.name: White Skeletal Warhorse
65645.description: When fallen heroes are raised into undeath, so too are their horses.
65645.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Eliza Killian
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 500

65646.name: Swift Burgundy Wolf
65646.description: The wolves of the Horde are befriended, not domesticated.
65646.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Freka Bloodaxe
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 500

65917.name: Magic Rooster
65917.description: Magic in the hands of a genius can do wonderful, miraculous things. Magic in the hands of an idiot can make a giant rooster.
65917.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

66087.name: Silver Covenant Hippogryph
66087.description: Silver Covenant Hippogryphs are fiercely loyal, both to their riding partners, and to the Alliance.
66087.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Hiren Loresong
Zone: Icecrown
Faction: The Silver Covenant - Exalted
Cost: 150

66088.name: Sunreaver Dragonhawk
66088.description: The Sunreavers of Dalaran select only the swiftest and most formidable of dragonhawks as their mounts.
66088.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Vasarin Redmorn
Zone: Icecrown
Faction: The Sunreavers - Exalted
Cost: 150

66090.name: Quel'dorei Steed
66090.description: Comes from a lineage of fine horses that once grazed near the shores of the Well of Eternity.
66090.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Hiren Loresong
Zone: Icecrown
Faction: The Silver Covenant - Exalted
Cost: 100

66091.name: Sunreaver Hawkstrider
66091.description: I demand speed, grace and discipline on the battlefield. This one will serve nicely. -Eressea Dawnsinger
66091.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Vasarin Redmorn
Zone: Icecrown
Faction: The Sunreavers - Exalted
Cost: 100

66122.name: Magic Rooster
66122.description: Magic in the hands of a genius can do wonderful, miraculous things. Magic in the hands of an idiot can make a giant rooster.
66122.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

66123.name: Magic Rooster
66123.description: Magic in the hands of a genius can do wonderful, miraculous things. Magic in the hands of an idiot can make a giant rooster.
66123.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

66124.name: Magic Rooster
66124.description: Magic in the hands of a genius can do wonderful, miraculous things. Magic in the hands of an idiot can make a giant rooster.
66124.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

66846.name: Ochre Skeletal Warhorse
66846.description: When fallen heroes are raised into undeath, so too are their horses.
66846.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Zachariah Post
Zone: Tirisfal Glades
Cost: 10

66847.name: Striped Dawnsaber
66847.description: Night elves once believed that seeing this light colored saber breed in the wild was an ill omen.
66847.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Lelanai
Zone: Teldrassil
Cost: 1

66906.name: Argent Charger
66906.description: Trained to accept only champions of the Light as a rider.
66906.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Dame Evniki Kapsalis
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 100

67336.name: Relentless Gladiator's Frost Wyrm
67336.description: In life, it could not be tamed, but necromancy and esoteric binding rituals have now combined to bend this indomitable creature to its rider's will.

67466.name: Argent Warhorse
67466.description: Given only to those who prove themselves a champion in the Argent Tournament.
67466.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Dame Evniki Kapsalis
Zone: Icecrown
Cost: 100

68056.name: Swift Horde Wolf
68056.description: A few of the Argent Crusade's swiftest mounts were awarded to those members of the Horde who performed exceptionally during the tournament in Icecrown.

68057.name: Swift Alliance Steed
68057.description: A few of the Argent Crusade's swiftest mounts were awarded to those members of the Alliance who performed exceptionally during the tournament in Icecrown.

68187.name: Crusader's White Warhorse
68187.description: Awarded to only the most skilled champions from the Trial of the Crusader, these steeds were chosen for Alliance members from Tirion Fordring's own personal stable.

68188.name: Crusader's Black Warhorse
68188.description: Awarded to only the most skilled champions from the Trial of the Crusader, these steeds were chosen for Horde members from Tirion Fordring's own personal stable.

69395.name: Onyxian Drake
69395.description: She has a lot in common with her mother, except for the being killed and reanimated. But she is young still. -Maloriak

69820.name: Sunwalker Kodo
69820.description: This magnificent beast, adorned in sacred charms and painted with holy imagery, radiates with the warmth of the sun.

69826.name: Great Sunwalker Kodo
69826.description: At daybreak, the noble Sunwalkers often perform rituals to bless their mounts, imbuing them with holy magic.

71342.name: X-45 Heartbreaker
71342.description: Apothecary Hummel painted this masterpiece bright pink for an unrequited love.

71810.name: Wrathful Gladiator's Frost Wyrm
71810.description: Many believe that during their early lives, these wyrms were forced to fight their own kind for the amusement of others. Perhaps that is why they possess a particularly combative temperament.

72286.name: Invincible
72286.description: The famous steed of Arthas Menethil, who serves its master in life and in death.  Riding him is truly a feat of strength.
72286.sourceDesc:
Drop: The Lich King
Zone: Icecrown Citadel

72807.name: Icebound Frostbrood Vanquisher
72807.description: Raised from the chilling depths of Icecrown, Frostbrood Vanquishers are considered among the fiercest and most relentless of all frost wyrms.
72807.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Icecrown Raider (25 player)
Category: Dungeons & Raids

72808.name: Bloodbathed Frostbrood Vanquisher
72808.description: Bloodbathed Vanquishers are so named when it is determined that a reanimated frost wyrm died a particularly gruesome and bloody death.
72808.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Icecrown Raider (10 player)
Category: Dungeons & Raids

73313.name: Crimson Deathcharger
73313.description: Stabled in the Icecrown Citadel to serve the Lich King's most favored minions.
73313.sourceDesc:
Quest: Mograine's Reunion
Zone: Icecrown Citadel

73629.name: Exarch's Elekk
73629.description: Draenei exarchs have long marched into war atop these imposing mounts, bred for their razor-sharp tusks.

73630.name: Great Exarch's Elekk
73630.description: Only the most distinguished paladins are given the honor of riding this elekk. Its plated armor and purple adornments have been blessed by Prophet Velen himself.

74856.name: Blazing Hippogryph
74856.description: Hippogryphs are highly intelligent, sentient beings; far more than mere "mounts."
74856.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

74918.name: Wooly White Rhino
74918.description: Captured by Toby "Mother Goose" Ironbolt on the Borean Tundra, this shaggy beast carries an enormous grudge after being bridled by a gnome.
74918.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

75207.name: Vashj'ir Seahorse
75207.description: Stubborn until broken, these underwater mounts provide the swiftest means of travel around the depths of Vashj'ir.
75207.sourceDesc:
Quest: The Abyssal Ride
Zone: Kelp'thar Forest

75596.name: Frosty Flying Carpet
75596.description: "I remember my first flying carpet... yeti hair and burlap.  Not nearly as nice as this one here." - Frozo the Renowned

75614.name: Celestial Steed
75614.description: A beacon of hope; a guiding light in the darkness.

75973.name: X-53 Touring Rocket
75973.description: Riding a giant cylinder filled with highly explosive goblin rocket fuel all by yourself is just crazy...so bring a friend.

84751.name: Fossilized Raptor
84751.description: Legends tell of a spell placed upon a hunting raptor who dared to snarl at young Tyrande Whisperwind as she bathed in a jungle pool. The beast is cursed to wander Azeroth -  until it apologizes.

87090.name: Goblin Trike
87090.description: A compilation of nuts, bolts, gears, and treated wood paneling make for an unusually smooth ride.
87090.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Kall Worthaton
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

87091.name: Goblin Turbo-Trike
87091.description: The turbo trike's tri-wheel design adds superior stability and a smaller turn radius over its two wheeled cousins.
87091.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Kall Worthaton
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 10

88331.name: Volcanic Stone Drake
88331.description: Fire can transform stone in exciting ways, but never let the Stonemother know I said that. -Earthcaller Yevaa
88331.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Cataclysm Hero
Category: Dungeons & Raids

88335.name: Drake of the East Wind
88335.description: In Deathwing's mad quest to forge new dragons, he ignored amazing breeds never before seen on Azeroth. -Thrall
88335.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Cataclysm Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

88718.name: Phosphorescent Stone Drake
88718.description: The Stonemother has shown little concern for the rebellious Aeonaxx, even allowing his spawn to be taken from her realm.

88741.name: Drake of the West Wind
88741.description: Harnessing the elemental powers of the storm, these majestic beasts crackle like lightning and roar like thunder.
88741.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Quartermaster Brazie
Zone: Tol Barad Peninsula
Faction: Baradin's Wardens - Exalted

88742.name: Drake of the North Wind
88742.description: They sicken of the calm who know the storm.
88742.sourceDesc:
Drop: Altairus
Zone: The Vortex Pinnacle

88744.name: Drake of the South Wind
88744.description: Gentle as a summer breeze, but that says little considering where it came from. -Itesh
88744.sourceDesc:
Drop: Al'Akir
Zone: Throne of the Four Winds

88746.name: Vitreous Stone Drake
88746.description: Those would be perfect in a pendant, and that would make a fantastic ring. Let me know if this thing sheds or molts or whatever. -Kalinda

88748.name: Brown Riding Camel
88748.description: Fennimore Quigley is credited with milking the first camel and breaking the record for "longest unintentional flight," all in the same afternoon.
88748.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Blacksmith Abasi
Zone: Uldum
Faction: Ramkahen - Exalted
Cost: 100

88749.name: Tan Riding Camel
88749.description: Fennimore Quigley is credited with milking the first camel and breaking the record for "longest unintentional flight," all in the same afternoon.
88749.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Blacksmith Abasi
Zone: Uldum
Faction: Ramkahen - Exalted
Cost: 100

88750.name: Grey Riding Camel
88750.description: Fennimore Quigley is credited with milking the first camel and breaking the record for "longest unintentional flight," all in the same afternoon.
88750.sourceDesc:
Drop: Dormus the Camel-Hoarder
Zone: Feralas

88990.name: Dark Phoenix
88990.description: Despite their name, Dark Phoenixes are known to have a warm and cheerful disposition.

90621.name: Golden King
90621.description: Don't let the saddle fool you, he's wild, not a tame lion.

92155.name: Ultramarine Qiraji Battle Tank
92155.description: The Tol'vir sorcerer Azj'Aqir was said to possess a scepter that would allow him to control a Qiraj battle tank outside of its Silithus home.

92231.name: Spectral Steed
92231.description: Dark spirits flee before the radiance of its presence.
92231.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Quartermaster Brazie
Zone: Tol Barad Peninsula
Faction: Baradin's Wardens - Exalted
Cost: 165

92232.name: Spectral Wolf
92232.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Pogg
Zone: Tol Barad Peninsula
Faction: Hellscream's Reach - Exalted
Cost: 165

93326.name: Sandstone Drake
93326.description: Sandstone Drakes were studied in great detail long ago by the famed alchemist Walleye Sprysprocket. It has even been said that Walleye developed potions to mimic the drakes' physiology.

93623.name: Mottled Drake
93623.description: I thought the thing was ill until it took to the air. It flies as true as any of my own. -Alexstrasza
93623.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

93644.name: Kor'kron Annihilator
93644.description: Vicious in battle and surprisingly loyal, this battle scorpion serves only those who show true commitment to a powerful guild.
93644.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Goram
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1500

96491.name: Armored Razzashi Raptor
96491.description: The purebred royal raptors of Zul'Gurub, these mounts have become a rare sight in Stranglethorn Vale. The Gurubashi have been known to fly into a rage at the sight of any non-troll riding one of their precious beasts.

96499.name: Swift Zulian Panther
96499.description: The jungle trolls have long coveted panther fangs, using them for rituals or as ingredients in mojos.
96499.sourceDesc:
Drop: High Priestess Kilnara
Zone: Zul'Gurub

96503.name: Amani Dragonhawk
96503.description: Dragonhawks liberated from troll enslavement are considered among the most loyal of all their kin.
96503.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

97359.name: Flameward Hippogryph
97359.description: Flameward Hippogryphs revel in the defeat of Ragnaros, Lord of Fire.
97359.sourceDesc:
Achievement: The Molten Front Offensive
Category: Cataclysm

97493.name: Pureblood Fire Hawk
97493.description: Legends state that the Pureblood line may be traced back to the very creation of the Firelands.

97501.name: Felfire Hawk
97501.description: Felfire is deadly to the touch.  Luckily, the hawk can suppress the flames, choosing not to incinerate its rider in an emerald effigy.

97560.name: Corrupted Fire Hawk
97560.description: Millagazor was a fire hawk loyal to Ragnaros. At this time it is unknown how many of Millagazor's eggs were corrupted.
97560.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Firelands Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

97581.name: Savage Raptor
97581.description: One-time companion of Kanga the Primal, the fallen troll hero. The raptor's name is unknown, for Kanga only spoke to it in bear form.
97581.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

98204.name: Amani Battle Bear
98204.description: The Amani trolls decorate these ferocious mounts in magic amulets and ceremonial masks as a way to venerate the bear god Nalorakk.

98718.name: Subdued Seahorse
98718.description: "One has not truly lived until they have felt the tidal current rushing through their hair while atop a majestic seahorse," said no one.  Ever.

98727.name: Winged Guardian
98727.description: Unearthed recently in an ancient tomb, this mighty winged lion may have once served one of the ancient Tol'vir princes.

100332.name: Vicious War Steed
100332.description: Armored to withstand collisions in battle.
100332.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Veteran of the Alliance II
Category: Rated Battleground

100333.name: Vicious War Wolf
100333.description: At Warchief Hellscream's command, Horde trainers began raising wolves to thrive in the shock and ferocity of sustained combat.
100333.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Veteran of the Horde II
Category: Rated Battleground

101282.name: Vicious Gladiator's Twilight Drake
101282.description: Heroes who proved their might in the gladiatorial arenas during the Cataclysm were awarded the most exceptional of the twilight drake broods.

101542.name: Flametalon of Alysrazor
101542.description: As with their matriarch, Alysrazor, the fury and fervor of these elemental avians are unquenchable.

101573.name: Swift Shorestrider
101573.description: A rarity amongst the tallstrider breeds of Kalimdor, but easily recognized by its pungent dead seaweed aroma.
101573.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

101821.name: Ruthless Gladiator's Twilight Drake
101821.description: Heroes who proved their might in the gladiatorial arenas during the Cataclysm were awarded the most exceptional of the twilight drake broods.

102346.name: Swift Forest Strider
102346.description: This vibrant breed can only be found in the forests of Darkmoon Island.
102346.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Lhara
Zone: Darkmoon Island
Cost: 180

102349.name: Swift Springstrider
102349.description: The joys of Noblegarden are best when celebrated with this loyal, loving, and blandly-colored freak of nature.
102349.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Noblegarden Merchant
Zone: Durotar, Eversong Woods, Mulgore, Tirisfal Glades, Azuremyst Isle,
Dun Morogh, Elwynn Forest, Teldrassil
Cost: 500

102350.name: Swift Lovebird
102350.description: It's like red but not quite.
102350.sourceDesc:
World Event: Love is in the Air

Vendor: Lovely Merchant (Alliance)
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 270

Vendor: Lovely Merchant (Horde)
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 270

Vendor: Lovely Merchant (Horde)
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 270

102488.name: White Riding Camel
102488.description: Fennimore Quigley is credited with milking the first camel and breaking the record for "longest unintentional flight," all in the same afternoon.
102488.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

102514.name: Corrupted Hippogryph
102514.description: It is a sad fact that even the wise and majestic hippogryph may fall prey to corruption.
102514.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

103081.name: Darkmoon Dancing Bear
103081.description: These fearsome mounts have a habit of suddenly breaking out into dance amid battle, much to the annoyance of their riders.
103081.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Lhara
Zone: Darkmoon Island
Cost: 180

103195.name: Mountain Horse
103195.description: Images of this breed are often found on kegs of watered-down dwarven brew.
103195.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Astrid Langstrump
Zone: Darnassus
Cost: 1

103196.name: Swift Mountain Horse
103196.description: Longs for the day it may return to its home in Gilneas.
103196.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Astrid Langstrump
Zone: Darnassus
Cost: 10

107203.name: Tyrael's Charger
107203.description: A symbol of justice throughout all known realms.

107516.name: Spectral Gryphon
107516.description: When you said an old friend was coming back, this was not quite what I expected. -Bralla Cloudwing

107517.name: Spectral Wind Rider
107517.description: How do you not fall right through that thing? -Maztha

107842.name: Blazing Drake
107842.description: Blazing Drakes exhibit a boundless passion for life, and are considered by many to be among the most loyal mounts on Azeroth.
107842.sourceDesc:
Drop: Elementium Fragment
Location: Dragon Soul

107844.name: Twilight Harbinger
107844.description: Whatever dark magic once compelled the Twilight Harbinger is now broken... or is it?
107844.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Dragon Soul Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

107845.name: Life-Binder's Handmaiden
107845.description: Alexstrasza, the former dragon Aspect of Life, is known to be a kind and patient mentor. Under her tutelage, only the most dedicated pupils acquire the title of "Life-Binder's Handmaiden."
107845.sourceDesc:
Drop: Elementium Fragment
Location: Dragon Soul

110039.name: Experiment 12-B
110039.description: Some believe Experiment 12-B is the result of a covert SI-7 initiative, others consider it the outcome of embyronic tinkering by goblin scientists. No matter the case, this much is certain: given its strength, speed and agility, Experiment 12-B was a success!
110039.sourceDesc:
Drop: Lesser Cache of the Aspects
Location: Dragon Soul

110051.name: Heart of the Aspects
110051.description: You are Azeroth's true guardians and the future of this world is in your hands, for the dawning of the age of mortals has begun. - Alexstrasza

113120.name: Feldrake
113120.description: Fighting the Burning Legion millennia ago, this valiant drake fell to corruption after its body was infused with raw demonic magic.
113120.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

113199.name: Jade Cloud Serpent
113199.description: Jade Cloud Serpents are light and agile; quick and deadly.
113199.sourceDesc:
Quest: Riding the Skies
Zone: The Jade Forest

118089.name: Azure Water Strider
118089.description: "Normally bugs are for bait, but how could you look into its eyes and even think that?" -Nat Pagle
118089.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Nat Pagle
Zone: Krasarang Wilds
Faction: The Anglers - Exalted
Cost: 1000

118737.name: Pandaren Kite
118737.description: This "mount," awarded by the Lorewalkers of Pandaria, is a reward to the hero of their organization.

120043.name: Jeweled Onyx Panther
120043.description: Trade Prince Gallywix recently ordered dozens of these glittering jewel-encrusted mounts to roam the grounds of his pleasure palace.

120395.name: Green Dragon Turtle
120395.description: Cherished for their heavy carrying capacity and steady gait, these stalwart beasts are the mount of choice for most native Pandaren.
120395.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Turtlemaster Odai
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

Vendor: Old Whitenose
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 1

120822.name: Great Red Dragon Turtle
120822.description: "Packaged upgrades include; dual-lantern fog lights, emergency brew keg, and genuine Tanji leather seat."  - Turtlemaster Odai
120822.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Turtlemaster Odai
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 10

Vendor: Old Whitenose
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 10

121820.name: Obsidian Nightwing
121820.description: When you can't run, you crawl, and when you can't crawl you find someone to carry you.

121836.name: Sapphire Panther
121836.description: Legends say that an ancient pandaren emperor crafted the first jeweled panther for his son after the boy's twin brother died of an illness.

121837.name: Jade Panther
121837.description: Legends say that an ancient pandaren emperor crafted the first jeweled panther for his son after the boy's twin brother died of an illness.

121838.name: Ruby Panther
121838.description: Legends say that an ancient pandaren emperor crafted the first jeweled panther for his son after the boy's twin brother died of an illness.

121839.name: Sunstone Panther
121839.description: Legends say that an ancient pandaren emperor crafted the first jeweled panther for his son after the boy's twin brother died of an illness.

122708.name: Grand Expedition Yak
122708.description: These beasts of burden are known to carry over five times their own weight and to be capable of lasting several days without food or water.
122708.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Uncle Bigpocket
Zone: Kun-Lai Summit
Cost: 120000

123182.name: White Riding Yak
123182.description: Riding Yaks are bred to be slimmer and more agile than their kin.

123886.name: Amber Scorpion
123886.description: The Klaxxi ride massive scorpions into battle against their enemies.  A carapace hardened by amber provides superior protection while on the battlefield.
123886.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Ambersmith Zikk
Zone: Dread Wastes
Faction: The Klaxxi - Exalted
Cost: 10000

123992.name: Azure Cloud Serpent
123992.description: Azure Cloud Serpents are believed by the Pandaren to be harbingers of good fortune.
123992.sourceDesc:
Quest: Riding the Skies
Zone: The Jade Forest

123993.name: Golden Cloud Serpent
123993.description: Golden Cloud Serpents are a treasure to be enjoyed by all who visit the continent of Pandaria.
123993.sourceDesc:
Quest: Riding the Skies
Zone: The Jade Forest

124408.name: Thundering Jade Cloud Serpent
124408.description: From their infancy, Thundering Cloud Serpents are drawn to storms. They have been known to chase lightning through the blackened, roiling clouds, and to bathe in the pouring rain.
124408.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Shay Pressler (Alliance)
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 3000

Vendor: Goram (Horde)
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 3000

124550.name: Cataclysmic Gladiator's Twilight Drake
124550.description: Heroes who proved their might in the gladiatorial arenas during the Cataclysm were awarded the most exceptional of the twilight drake broods.

124659.name: Imperial Quilen
124659.description: Favorite pets of the ancient Mogu princes, Quilen make loyal and fearless companions and mounts.
124659.sourceDesc: <span style="color: #FFD200">Promotion: Mists of Pandaria Collector's Edition

126507.name: Depleted-Kyparium Rocket
126507.description: When Kyparite is depleted of its amber essence it becomes fairly resistant to the corrosion from rocket fuel.

126508.name: Geosynchronous World Spinner
126508.description: This rocket was originally designed to speed up the rotation of the world making for shorter nights.  Gnomes with insomnia can have lofty goals.

127154.name: Onyx Cloud Serpent
127154.description: Onyx Cloud serpents are known to be more aggressive and daring than their cousins, the Heavenly Onyx Cloud Serpents.
127154.sourceDesc:
Quest: Surprise Attack!
Location: Townlong Steppes

127156.name: Crimson Cloud Serpent
127156.description: Crimson Cloud Serpents are given to flights of fancy, striking out on a whim for seemingly random journeys, sometimes for days at a time.
127156.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Pandaria Hero
Category: Dungeons & Raids

127158.name: Heavenly Onyx Cloud Serpent
127158.description: Heavenly Onyx Cloud Serpents are born with violet scales covering the entirety of their body. Over time, these scales darken to the color of onyx.
127158.sourceDesc:
Drop: Sha of Anger
Location: Kun-Lai Summit

127161.name: Heavenly Crimson Cloud Serpent
127161.description: Heavenly Crimson Cloud Serpents are considered to be among the noblest of dragons.
127161.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Pandaria Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

127164.name: Heavenly Golden Cloud Serpent
127164.description: Warmth and hope emanate from this great creature, which glows like a sunrise over the mountains.
127164.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Mistweaver Ku
Zone: Timeless Isle
Faction: Emperor Shaohao - Exalted

127165.name: Yu'lei, Daughter of Jade
127165.description: Warmth and wisdom emanate from this great creature, which glows like moonlight passing through the finest jade.
127165.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Mistweaver Xia
Zone: Timeless Isle
Cost: 5000

127169.name: Heavenly Azure Cloud Serpent
127169.description: Warmth and serenity emanate from this great creature, which glows like the cloudless sky of a summer afternoon.
127169.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Lord of the Reins
Category: Mounts

127170.name: Astral Cloud Serpent
127170.description: It is believed that Astral Cloud Serpents possess answers to some of life's greatest mysteries. Pity they can't talk.

127174.name: Azure Riding Crane
127174.description: The majestic crane is a treasured friend of the pandaren.
127174.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Jaluu the Generous
Zone: Vale of Eternal Blossoms
Faction: Golden Lotus - Exalted
Cost: 500

127176.name: Golden Riding Crane
127176.description: The crane is a symbol of wisdom and nobility, their ability to carry us into the skies is nothing short of miraculous. - Jaluu the Generous
127176.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Jaluu the Generous
Zone: Vale of Eternal Blossoms
Faction: Golden Lotus - Exalted
Cost: 2500

127177.name: Regal Riding Crane

Faction: Golden Lotus - Exalted
Cost: 1500

127209.name: Black Riding Yak
127209.description: Grummles traveling Kun-Lai Summit by night prefer to ride this dark-haired yak to remain unseen, though they remove the bells from its caparison first.

127213.name: Brown Riding Yak
127213.description: Riding Yaks are bred to be slimmer and more agile than their kin.

127216.name: Grey Riding Yak
127216.description: Riding Yaks are bred to be slimmer and more agile than their kin.

129552.sourceDesc:

Location: Vale of Eternal Blossoms
Cost: 1

129918.name: Thundering August Cloud Serpent
129918.description: From their infancy, Thundering Cloud Serpents are drawn to storms. They have been known to chase lightning through the blackened, roiling clouds, and to bathe in the pouring rain.
129918.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Sage Whiteheart (Alliance)
Zone: Vale of Eternal Blossoms
Faction: The August Celestials - Exalted

129932.name: Green Shado-Pan Riding Tiger
129932.description: "When waking a tiger, use a long stick. Better yet, tell your friend to wake the tiger instead." --Pandaren Proverb
129932.sourceDesc:
