130965.name: Son of Galleon
130965.description: Trained from a young age, these massive kushan are taught to thunder into battle carrying a full saurok warband.
130965.sourceDesc:
Drop: Galleon
Location: Valley of the Four Winds

130985.name: Pandaren Kite
130985.description: This token of honor is a gift from the Lorewalkers of Pandaria. Flying manual seemingly not included, however.

132036.name: Thundering Ruby Cloud Serpent
132036.description: From their infancy, Thundering Cloud Serpents are drawn to storms. They have been known to chase lightning through the blackened, roiling clouds, and to bathe in the pouring rain.
132036.sourceDesc:
Drop: Alani
Zone: Vale of Eternal Blossoms

132117.name: Ashen Pandaren Phoenix
132117.description: Both the name and color of this majestic phoenix are believed to symbolize rebirth.

132118.name: Emerald Pandaren Phoenix
132118.description: The colors of this rare phoenix's plumage are said to bring great fortune.

132119.name: Violet Pandaren Phoenix
132119.description: The Violet Phoenix's plumage is said to symbolize a union of opposing forces.

133023.name: Jade Pandaren Kite
133023.description: The residents of Pandaria salute your enthusiasm for wildlife preservation. They do have concerns about housing 150 animals per visit, though.
133023.sourceDesc:
Achievement: We're Going to Need More Saddles
Category: General

134359.name: Sky Golem
134359.description: A glorious feat of engineering, the sky golem takes traditional shredder technology to a whole new level (and altitude!).

134573.name: Swift Windsteed
134573.description: One of Pandaria's most elusive creatures, said to bring good fortune to its rider.

135416.name: Grand Armored Gryphon
135416.description: This noble gryphon is as staunch a battle companion as any member of the Alliance could ask for.
135416.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Agent Malley
Zone: Krasarang Wilds
Faction: Operation: Shieldwall - Exalted
Cost: 2000

135418.name: Grand Armored Wyvern
135418.description: This ferocious beast, renowned among wyvern handlers, was one of the first mounts chosen to take part in the Horde's Dominance Offensive.
135418.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Tuskripper Grukna
Zone: Krasarang Wilds
Faction: Dominance Offensive - Exalted
Cost: 2000

136163.name: Grand Gryphon
136163.description: Gryphons' keen eyesight allows them to see over vast distances and warn their riders of any dangers that lie ahead.
136163.sourceDesc:
Quest: The Silence
Zone: Kun-Lai Summit

136164.name: Grand Wyvern
136164.description: Wyverns hail from some of the most inhospitable regions of Kalimdor, making them masters of adapting to any environment.
136164.sourceDesc:
Quest: Breath of Darkest Shadow
Zone: Kun-Lai Summit

136400.name: Armored Skyscreamer
136400.description: Only those heroic souls who surmount every challenge the mogu tyrants place before them can proudly fly the skies on a war-prepared skyscreamer.
136400.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Thundering Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

136471.name: Spawn of Horridon
136471.description: When you see a hurricane coming, you get out of the way. Horridon would fight the hurricane and win.
136471.sourceDesc:
Drop: Horridon
Zone: Throne of Thunder

136505.name: Ghastly Charger
136505.description: Not all of Medivh's victims are gone for good.
136505.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Landro Longshot
Location: Booty Bay

138423.name: Cobalt Primordial Direhorn
138423.description: "When ya fight alongside raptors, ya want a mount dey can't eat." -Unknown dinomancer
138423.sourceDesc:
Drop: Oondasta
Location: Isle of Giants

138424.name: Amber Primordial Direhorn
138424.description: There is an old Zandalari saying about wild direhorns: "Run!"
138424.sourceDesc:
Drop: Zandalari Warbringer
Zone: Dread Wastes, Kun-Lai Summit, Townlong Steppes, Valley of the Four Winds

138425.name: Slate Primordial Direhorn
138425.description: The masks aren't to control the direhorn; they are so no one sees your face when it turns on you.
138425.sourceDesc:
Drop: Zandalari Warbringer
Zone: Dread Wastes, Krasarang Wilds, Kun-Lai Summit, Townlong Steppes, Valley of the Four Winds

138426.name: Jade Primordial Direhorn
138426.description: The festive coloring belies deadly intent.
138426.sourceDesc:
Drop: Zandalari Warbringer
Zone: Dread Wastes, Kun-Lai Summit, Townlong Steppes, Valley of the Four Winds

138640.name: Bone-White Primal Raptor
138640.description: "They are lethal at eight months, very lethal." -Hemet Nesingwary Jr.
138640.sourceDesc:
Quest: A Mountain of Giant Dinosaur Bones
Zone: Isle of Giants

138641.name: Red Primal Raptor
138641.description: Raptors have spread to nearly all of the lands of Azeroth. It is uncertain whether the trolls led them or followed them.

138642.name: Black Primal Raptor
138642.description: Speed, cunning, and ferocity are the things trolls and raptors admire about each other.

138643.name: Green Primal Raptor
138643.description: "Raptors are as loyal as they are vicious. If you ain't friend, you are food." -Kijara

139407.name: Malevolent Gladiator's Cloud Serpent
139407.description: These cloud serpents have scales that... are the color of clouds, actually.

139442.name: Thundering Cobalt Cloud Serpent
139442.description: This is a descendant of the irascible Nalak. Lightning erupts from its scales and arcs over the saddle. Dare you sit?
139442.sourceDesc:
Drop: Nalak
Location: Isle of Thunder

139448.name: Clutch of Ji-Kun
139448.description: Although Ji-Kun feasted on the failed creations of mogu flesh-shapers, her progeny is willing to eat more pedestrian carcasses.
139448.sourceDesc:
Drop: Ji-Kun
Zone: Throne of Thunder

139595.name: Armored Bloodwing
139595.description: This monstrous, flesh-eating bat is the undisputed ruler of the night skies.

140249.name: Golden Primal Direhorn
140249.description: Sharp at both ends and crafty in the middle. Leave it to the trolls to think this was a good idea.
140249.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Hiren Loresong
Zone: Isle of Thunder
Faction: Kirin Tor Offensive - Exalted
Cost: 3000

140250.name: Crimson Primal Direhorn
140250.description: Leave it to the blood elves to pick the red one.
140250.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Vasarin Redmorn
Zone: Isle of Thunder
Faction: Sunreaver Onslaught - Exalted
Cost: 3000

142073.name: Hearthsteed
142073.description: Each step echoes with the rage of your three opponents.

142266.name: Armored Red Dragonhawk
142266.description: This rare breed of dragonhawk is a mark of honor in the Horde, gifted by the blood elves. It reflects your tireless effort to amass a small army of mounts.

142478.name: Armored Blue Dragonhawk
142478.description: After you amassed a massive menagerie of 200 mounts, the animal authorities of the Alliance sent you a means to keep them in line (and out of their hair).

142641.name: Brawler's Burly Mushan Beast
142641.description: For years pandaren believed these creatures to be untamable. Just ask the first pandaren to do so, Henshi "Limp Along" Homebrew.
142641.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Paul North
Zone: Brawl'gar Arena
Cost: 1500

142878.name: Enchanted Fey Dragon
142878.description: This majestic creature is Brightwing's older brother. He affirms that she was, in fact, adopted.

142910.name: Ironbound Wraithcharger
142910.description: Its ethereal spirit is barely contained by its iron shell. The penultimate creation of Salanar the Horseman, these powerful steeds were once thought to have all been destroyed.
142910.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Auzin
Zone: Dalaran
Cost: 5000

146615.name: Vicious Kaldorei Warsaber
146615.description: The blades adorning this mount's armor are designed to both inspire fear and pre-slice meals for the warsaber.
146615.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Necrolord Sipe
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 1

146622.name: Vicious Skeletal Warhorse
146622.description: Only rewarded to those who have bested their foes in battle.
146622.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Deathguard Netharian
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

148392.name: Spawn of Galakras
148392.description: This formidable creature's lineage may be traced to Galakras, and yet further to Galakrond, one of the most infamous of all proto-dragons.
148392.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Orgrimmar Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

148396.name: Kor'kron War Wolf
148396.description: The Kor'kron use only the mightiest wolves for their mounts, bedecking them in armor that would break the backs of lesser creatures.
148396.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Ahead of the Curve: Garrosh Hellscream (10/25 player)
Category: Feats of Strength

148417.name: Kor'kron Juggernaut
148417.description: The Kor'kron Juggernaut is a weapon of unbridled destruction, born from the mind of Garrosh Hellscream and made real by his engineers.
148417.sourceDesc:
Drop: Garrosh Hellscream
Location: Siege of Orgrimmar

148428.name: Ashhide Mushan Beast
148428.description: Some people say that riding an ashhide mushan will result in favorable health and increased prosperity. These people are called "mount vendors."
148428.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Speaker Gulan
Zone: Timeless Isle
Cost: 500

148476.name: Thundering Onyx Cloud Serpent
148476.description: This ebony cloud serpent is a lightning-wreathed vision of such rarity as to have driven many mortals to madness.

148618.name: Tyrannical Gladiator's Cloud Serpent
148618.description: These cloud serpents always look elegant and slim in classic black.

148619.name: Grievous Gladiator's Cloud Serpent
148619.description: These brilliantly colored cloud serpents have scales that are a mixture of ruby, gold, and nearly violet.

148620.name: Prideful Gladiator's Cloud Serpent
148620.description: These brilliantly colored cloud serpents have scales that range from gold to pink. Or we could call it coral.

149801.name: Emerald Hippogryph
149801.description: These majestic animals come in various colorings, but the emerald variety can only be tamed by the magic of friendship.

153489.name: Iron Skyreaver
153489.description: Iron Horde beastmasters bred this rylak for war and then girded it for battle in black steel and smoldering flame.

155741.name: Dread Raven
155741.description: Filled with the hatred of an ancient god, the dread raven are the Arakkoa's most trusted guardians.
155741.sourceDesc: Promotion: Warlords of Draenor Collector's Edition

163024.name: Warforged Nightmare
163024.description: A nightmarish steed of hardened steel and vengeful spirits, this companion will follow you to the depths of the Firelands and back without complaint.

163025.name: Grinning Reaver
163025.description: The difference between a smile and a grin is the difference between a kiss and tasting.

169952.name: Creeping Carpet
169952.description: Can't fly, but can creep very quickly.

170347.name: Core Hound
170347.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Boldly, You Sought the Power of Ragnaros
Category: Feats of Strength

171436.name: Gorestrider Gronnling
171436.description: Once "befriended", a gronnling will happily carry its rider to their death.
171436.sourceDesc: <span style="color: #FFD200">Achievement: Glory of the Draenor Raider

171616.name: Witherhide Cliffstomper
171616.description: Tiny notches cover the hooves of this variation of clefthoof, allowing it to safely scale mountainous regions in search of food.
171616.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Trader Araanda
Zone: Lunarfall
Cost: 20000

Vendor: Trader Darakk
Zone: Frostwall
Cost: 20000

171617.name: Trained Icehoof
171617.description: It wasn't until you owned this mount that you understood how much the world of Draenor would test you. Clefthoof hair gets in everything!

171619.name: Tundra Icehoof
171619.description: A translucent layer of down hair covers this breed's leathery hide, acting as the perfect insulation for cold environments.
171619.sourceDesc:
Drop: Vengeance, Deathtalon, Terrorfist, Doomroller
Zone: Tanaan Jungle

171620.name: Bloodhoof Bull
171620.description: Members of the Warsong clan have long hunted these clefthoof to use their crimson-hued skin for battle standards.
171620.sourceDesc:
Drop: Nakk the Thunderer
Location: Nagrand

171621.name: Ironhoof Destroyer
171621.description: Blackhand is said to have personally designed the fiery armaments used on the Iron Horde's clefthoof battle mounts.

171622.name: Mottled Meadowstomper
171622.description: The elekk's long trunk allows it to sniff out sources of food, avoid danger, and steal snacks from your bags when you're not looking.

171623.name: Trained Meadowstomper
171623.description: The draenei perfected elekk husbandry long ago, adorning the creatures with Light-infused crystals to make them more docile.

171624.name: Shadowhide Pearltusk
171624.description: Some legends say the draenei first befriended the elekk after one of the beasts saved an injured scout from a pack of vicious podlings.

171625.name: Dusty Rockhide
171625.description: Ever since acquiring this mount, you have been plagued by strange fever dreams of hippety-hoppety clippety-cloppety elekk on parade.
171625.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Vindicator Nuurem
Faction: Council of Exarchs - Exalted
Location: Stormshield
Cost: 5,000 + 5,000

171626.name: Armored Irontusk
171626.description: It is said an elekk never forgets. No wonder it despises the Iron Horde, considering the torment the orcs put the beast through.
171626.sourceDesc:
Vendor:
Faction: Sha'tari Defense - Exalted
Location: Garrison Trading Post
Cost: 5,000 + 5,000

171627.name: Blacksteel Battleboar
171627.description: Refuses to run unless its head is covered in heavy, spiked metal. It's an ego thing.
171627.sourceDesc: Achievement: Guild Glory of the Draenor Raider

171628.name: Rocktusk Battleboar
171628.description: It's not the metal helmet that attracts mates; it's the sweet mohawk.
171628.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Trader Araanda
Zone: Lunarfall
Cost: 10000

Vendor: Trader Darakk
Zone: Frostwall
Cost: 10000

171629.name: Armored Frostboar
171629.description: Subsists almost entirely on a diet of frozen berries. Though it finds slow off-worlders equally tasty.

171630.name: Armored Razorback
171630.description: Never... ever... EVER... let it smell bacon on you.
171630.sourceDesc:
Drop: Vengeance, Deathtalon, Terrorfist, Doomroller
Zone: Tanaan Jungle

171632.name: Frostplains Battleboar
171632.description: If it didn't have the cool tusk ring, it would feel so silly in that outfit.
171632.sourceDesc: <span style="color: #FFD200">Achievement: Glory of the Draenor Hero

171633.name: Wild Goretusk
171633.description: If you want a gentle ride, go find a "tame happytusk" or something.
171633.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Z'tenga the Walker
Zone: Tanaan Jungle
Faction: The Saberstalkers - Honored
Cost: 1000

171634.name: Domesticated Razorback
171634.description: "Domesticated" does not mean "friendly." Bring some treats.
171634.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Gazrix Gearlock / Mimi Wizzlebub
Faction: Steamwheedle "Preservation" Society - Exalted
Location: Stormshield / Warspear
Cost: 5,000 + 5,000

171635.name: Giant Coldsnout
171635.description: Its snout is not just cold but wet. Not a pleasant way to wake up.

171636.name: Great Greytusk
171636.description: Sheds its tusks once a year. Is extremely shy until they grow back.

171637.name: Trained Rocktusk
171637.description: Thoroughly trained in how to snort, trot, and stomp on the faces of its enemies.

171638.name: Trained Riverwallow
171638.description: Riverwallows are one of the heartiest beasts on Draenor, resulting in their increased stamina and distinctive coloring.

171824.name: Sapphire Riverbeast
171824.description: This animal's color mimics the clear blue of Draenor's river shallows, making it almost invisible to aquatic predators.

171825.name: Mosshide Riverwallow
171825.description: Aggressive and territorial, the mosshide is known for hiding in river-shore scrub and ambushing unwary passersby.
171825.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Dawn-Seeker Krek / Dawn-Seeker Alkset
Location: Stormshield / Warspear
Cost: 50,000 + 5,000

171826.name: Mudback Riverbeast
171826.description: Special webbing that grows on the soles of the mudback's feet gives them extra traction in mud and slick terrain.
171826.sourceDesc: Garrison Mission: It's a Boat, It's a Plane, It's... Just a Riverbeast.

171827.name: Hellfire Infernal
171827.description: From the bowels of the nether is summoned a creature of pure hatred, bent on burning down any life in its way.

171828.name: Solar Spirehawk
171828.description: Looking into the eyes of this mystical beast is like peering into the heart of the sun. Goggles are recommended when you're riding.

171829.name: Shadowmane Charger
171829.description: Draenei poets have likened this talbuk's coloring to shadows cast by moonlight in an ashen forest.
171829.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Ravenspeaker Skeega / Shadow-Sage Brakoss
Faction: Arakkoa Outcasts - Exalted
Location: Stormshield / Warspear
Cost: 5,000 + 5,000

171830.name: Swift Breezestrider
171830.description: Draenei have relied on this mount, the swiftest of all talbuk, to relay messengers and their missives safely to their destinations.

171831.name: Trained Silverpelt
171831.description: Prized for its intelligence, this breed of talbuk can be trained to execute defensive kicks and gorings in battle.

171832.name: Breezestrider Stallion
171832.description: These breezestriders' red coloration reflects their temperament: sanguine, fierce, and courageous.
171832.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Dazzerian
Faction: Vol'jin's Spear - Exalted
Location: Warspear
Cost: 5,000 + 5,000

171833.name: Pale Thorngrazer
171833.description: This talbuk subsists completely on a diet of thistles and thorns, making its insides as tough as its outside.
171833.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Crafticus Mindbender
Faction: Wrynn's Vanguard - Exalted
Location: Stormshield
Cost: 5,000 + 5,000

171834.name: Vicious War Ram
171834.description: Until it head-butts you below the belt, it has not truly accepted you as its rider.
171834.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Necrolord Sipe
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 1

171835.name: Vicious War Raptor
171835.description: Because sharp teeth and claws weren't enough.
171835.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Deathguard Netharian
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

171836.name: Garn Steelmaw
171836.description: A trainer once tried to put decorative metal in his steelmaw wolf's mouth. He had to wait three days to get it back.

171837.name: Warsong Direfang
171837.description: Has a will of iron but is a sweetheart if you give it a clefthoof bone to chew on.
171837.sourceDesc:
Drop: Vengeance, Deathtalon, Terrorfist, Doomroller
Zone: Tanaan Jungle

171838.name: Armored Frostwolf
171838.description: It's trained to survive the harsh climate of Frostfire Ridge, so it snuggles as if its life depended on it.

171839.name: Ironside Warwolf
171839.description: It has an armored spike on its tail. Scratch its belly at your own risk.
171839.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Kil'rip
Faction: Laughing Skull - Exalted
Location: Horde Garrison Trading Post
Cost: 5,000 + 5,000

171841.name: Trained Snarler
171841.description: Enormously cute as a puppy. Slightly less so now.

171842.name: Swift Frostwolf
171842.description: Amidst the cold heights of Frostfire, the frostwolves hunt anything they can catch. The fastest among them eat well.
171842.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Beska Redtusk
Faction: Frostwolf Orcs - Exalted
Location: Warspear
Cost: 5,000 + 5,000

171843.name: Smoky Direwolf
171843.description: Believed to reside mostly in the north. Hates weddings.

171844.name: Dustmane Direwolf
171844.description: Cautious by direwolf standards, the dustmane can only be coaxed to ride with something it considers special.

171845.name: Warlord's Deathwheel
171845.description: Often referred to as the "Goblin Lawn Mower", this growling behemoth treats enemies like they are made of grass... ready to be mown down.
171845.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Warlord's Deathwheel
Category: Feats of Strength

171846.name: Champion's Treadblade
171846.description: Forged by human, gnome, and dwarf, this armored masterpiece is designed to slice a tauren into a tri-tip dinner with a flick of the handlebars.
171846.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Paulie
Zone: Stormwind, Old Town
Cost: 100000

171847.name: Cindermane Charger
171847.description: Formed by Ragnaros himself as a gift for the daughter he never had.

171848.name: Challenger's War Yeti
171848.description: Thankfully they move fast and mostly leave the smell behind them.

171849.name: Sunhide Gronnling
171849.description: Loves the sun, hates everything else.

171850.name: Llothien Prowler
171850.description: These sleek foxes can prowl amongst newly-fallen leaves without making a sound, even at this size.
171850.sourceDesc:
Quest: Volpin the Elusive
Zone: Suramar

171851.name: Garn Nighthowl
171851.description: The garn are the most fierce predators on Draenor, and always hunt in packs.

175700.name: Emerald Drake
175700.description: "Is the emerald drake rare?  You have no idea.  If I had a silver for every time someone asked me about one, I could have retired years ago." --Mei Francis

179244.name: Chauffeured Mechano-Hog
179244.description: Why drive yourself around when you can hire someone to do it for you?

179478.name: Voidtalon of the Dark Star
179478.description: Corrupted by the presence of the Dark Star in Draenor, the Voidtalons resisted being broken by the Shadowmoon Clan and were ultimately destroyed by Ner'zhul. Only a single egg remains, lost in the void.

180545.name: Mystic Runesaber
180545.description: Infused with arcane power, the Mystic Runesaber has long been hidden by chaotic nether energies. Recently they have emerged from the shadows in search of ley lines to sate their thirst for magic.

182912.name: Felsteel Annihilator
182912.description: Forged deep within Hellfire Citadel by a mad blacksmith, the Felsteel Annihilator combines the metalworking knowledge of the Iron Horde with the chaotic fel energies of the Burning Legion into an unholy union of steel and flame.
182912.sourceDesc:
Drop: Archimonde
Location: Hellfire Citadel
Difficulty: Mythic

183117.name: Corrupted Dreadwing
183117.description: Bathed in the blood of demons, these corrupted Dread Ravens are significantly more aggressive, and will often kill one another if kept in confinement.
183117.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Dawn-Seeker Krisek
Zone: Tanaan Jungle
Faction: Order of the Awakened - Friendly
Cost: 150,000

183889.name: Vicious War Mechanostrider
183889.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Necrolord Sipe
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 1

185052.name: Vicious War Kodo
185052.description: The spiked ball on the tail is strong enough to crush through even the most reinforced Alliance defenses.
185052.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Deathguard Netharian
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

186305.name: Infernal Direwolf
186305.description: A mighty wolf of Draenor, touched by the fel energies unleashed by Gul'dan in Tanaan Jungle. It has not gone completely mad... yet.
186305.sourceDesc: <span style="color: #FFD200">Achievement: Glory of the Hellfire Raider

186828.name: Primal Gladiator's Felblood Gronnling
186828.description: One of the gronnlings of Tanaan Jungle caught in the eruption of fel energies unleashed by Gul'dan, and now beholden to an unquenchable lust for chaos.
186828.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Warlords Season 1
Category: Feats of Strength

189043.name: Wild Gladiator's Felblood Gronnling
189043.description: One of the gronnlings of Tanaan Jungle caught in the eruption of fel energies unleashed by Gul'dan, and now beholden to an unquenchable lust for chaos.
189043.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Warlords Season 2
Category: Feats of Strength

189044.name: Warmongering Gladiator's Felblood Gronnling
189044.description: One of the gronnlings of Tanaan Jungle caught in the eruption of fel energies unleashed by Gul'dan, and now beholden to an unquenchable lust for chaos.
189044.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Warlords Season 3
Category: Feats of Strength

189364.name: Coalfist Gronnling
189364.description: This little gronnling is well-known for smashing his way into garrison inns and making a mess of the pots and pans.

189998.name: Illidari Felstalker
189998.description: The Illidari have broken some lesser demons for use against their Legion masters.

189999.name: Grove Warden
189999.description: These magical companions are the wardens of peaceful, primordial groves within the Emerald Dream.

190690.name: Bristling Hellboar
190690.description: The one and only source for the rare culinary ingredient: cursed bacon.
190690.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Z'tenga the Walker
Zone: Tanaan Jungle
Faction: The Saberstalkers - Exalted
Cost: 5000

190977.name: Deathtusk Felboar
190977.description: Veterans of the battle for Outland's Hellfire Penninsula are traumatized by thoughts of these beasts to this day.
190977.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Shadow Hunter Denjai
Zone: Tanaan Jungle
Faction: Vol'jin's Headhunters - Exalted

Vendor: Vindicator Krethos
Zone: Tanaan Jungle
Faction: Hand of the Prophet - Exalted

191314.name: Minion of Grumpus
191314.description: No one quite knows when the legend of Grumpus began in Draenor, but his toys are just the worst.
191314.sourceDesc: <span style="color: #FFD200">World Event: Feast of Winter Veil

191633.name: Soaring Skyterror
191633.description: The extra-light equipment on this chromatic rylak allows it to swoop and glide through the clouds easily, free from the bounds of the land below.

193007.name: Grove Defiler
193007.description: The Grove Wardens of the Emerald Dream were some of the first to fall to the corrupting influence of the Nightmare.
193007.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Legion Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

193695.name: Prestigious War Steed
193695.description: Armored to withstand collisions in battle.
193695.sourceDesc: Achievement: Free For All, More For Me

194046.name: Swift Spectral Rylak
194046.description: Even the dead need a lift every now and then.

194464.name: Eclipse Dragonhawk
194464.description: Captured from the renegade blood elves at Eclipse Point, these purple dragonhawks were often sought after by Scryers posted to the Sanctum of the Stars.
194464.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Cupri
Zone: Shattrath City
Cost: 5000

196681.name: Spirit of Eche'ro
196681.description: The spirit of Huln Highmountain's pet moose.

200175.name: Felsaber
200175.description: A special creation of Lord Illidan gifted to his most trusted demon hunters.

201098.name: Infinite Timereaver
201098.description: Fickle and savage, these drakes slip in and out of time until they find a worthy rider.

204166.name: Prestigious War Wolf
204166.description: At Warchief Hellscream's command, Horde trainers began raising wolves to thrive in the shock and ferocity of sustained combat.
204166.sourceDesc: Achievement: Free For All, More For Me

213115.name: Bloodfang Widow
213115.description: Its long, serrated limbs drip with the blood of its enemies and/or mate.

213134.name: Felblaze Infernal
213134.description: The Illidari were able to break one of these fiery beasts for use as an unstoppable, fearless mount against the Legion.

213158.name: Predatory Bloodgazer
213158.description: The sheer amount of raw red berries these fierce omnivors consume gives them their distinctive eye color.

213163.name: Snowfeather Hunter
213163.description: Capable of hiding in a fog bank until prey approaches, then slicing them open with one claw-raised jump.

213164.name: Brilliant Direbeak
213164.description: The shimmering hides of these deceptively fierce and coordinated beasts is intended to confuse and disorient prey.

213165.name: Viridian Sharptalon
213165.description: Adept at blending into dense, magical forests, such as one may find around the Broken Isles.

213209.name: Steelbound Devourer
213209.description: Only the sturdiest-forged chains can restrain this beast.

213339.name: Great Northern Elderhorn
213339.description: One of the heartiest of species that inhabit the slopes of Highmountain, they can survive for months in freezing blizzards.

213350.name: Frostshard Infernal
213350.description: These icy minions come from an unknown plane far from this one.
213350.sourceDesc:
Achievement: No Stable Big Enough
Category: Mounts

214791.name: Brinedeep Bottom-Feeder
214791.description: These elusive fish prefer to skulk in the deepest reaches of the Great Sea, searching the darkness for food.
214791.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Conjurer Margoss
Zone: Dalaran
Faction: Conjurer Margoss - Honored
Cost: 100

215159.name: Long-Forgotten Hippogryph
215159.description: You are the only one that remembered.

215545.name: Mastercraft Gravewing
215545.description: Handcrafted by the Stonewright herself, this mastefully crafted stoneborn is entrusted only to those she deems worthy.
215545.sourceDesc:
Covenant: Venthyr
Drop: Stygian Stonecrusher
Zone: Korthia

215558.name: Ratstallion
215558.description: Years of chain-chugging potions in Dalaran's sewer system have allowed him to grow large, agile, and shadow resistant.
215558.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Underbelly Tycoon
Category: Broken Isles

221883.name: Charger
221883.description: Redeemed by the Light. Devoted to your cause.

221885.name: Great Sunwalker Kodo
221885.description: At daybreak, the noble Sunwalkers often perform rituals to bless their mounts, imbuing them with holy magic.

221886.name: Thalassian Charger
221886.description: A loyal companion to any who would protect Silvermoon.

221887.name: Great Exarch's Elekk
221887.description: Only the most distinguished paladins are given the honor of riding this elekk. Its plated armor and purple adornments have been blessed by Prophet Velen himself.

222202.name: Prestigious Bronze Courser
222202.description: One of the bold equines of the Broken Isles, unmatched among the steeds of Azeroth in ferocity and strength.

222236.name: Prestigious Royal Courser
222236.description: One of the bold equines of the Broken Isles, unmatched among the steeds of Azeroth in ferocity and strength.

222237.name: Prestigious Forest Courser
222237.description: One of the bold equines of the Broken Isles, unmatched among the steeds of Azeroth in ferocity and strength.

222238.name: Prestigious Ivory Courser
222238.description: One of the bold equines of the Broken Isles, unmatched among the steeds of Azeroth in ferocity and strength.

222240.name: Prestigious Azure Courser
222240.description: One of the bold equines of the Broken Isles, unmatched among the steeds of Azeroth in ferocity and strength.

222241.name: Prestigious Midnight Courser
222241.description: One of the bold equines of the Broken Isles, unmatched among the steeds of Azeroth in ferocity and strength.

223018.name: Fathom Dweller
223018.description: Deep within the hungering chasms of the Great Sea, swarms of Fathom Dwellers sway like a great floating carpet, sightlessly in the dark.

223341.name: Vicious Gilnean Warhorse
223341.description: Born, bred and battle tested in Gilneas.
223341.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Necrolord Sipe
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 1

223354.name: Vicious War Trike
223354.description: The most devastating technology money can buy.
223354.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Deathguard Netharian
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

223363.name: Vicious Warstrider
223363.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Deathguard Netharian
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

223578.name: Vicious War Elekk
223578.description: A favorite of warriors of the Exodar.
223578.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Necrolord Sipe
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 1

223814.name: Mechanized Lumber Extractor
223814.description: Jepetto may have over done it a little...
223814.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Remember to Share
Category: Toy Box

225765.name: Leyfeather Hippogryph
225765.description: Ancient mounts of the Highborne, now left to run wild in the Broken Isles, they can rarely be found due to their latent magical powers.
225765.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Legion Hero
Category: Dungeons & Raids

227956.name: Arcadian War Turtle
227956.description: Bred for destruction by an insane warlord in a far-off land, but at least the seat is warm.

227986.name: Vindictive Gladiator's Storm Dragon
227986.description: Born in the mountains of Stormheim, this terrifying fusion of storm and scale sets the sky ablaze in pursuit of its prey.
227986.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Legion Season 1
Category: Player vs. Player

227988.name: Fearless Gladiator's Storm Dragon
227988.description: Born in the mountains of Stormheim, this terrifying fusion of storm and scale sets the sky ablaze in pursuit of its prey.
227988.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Legion Season 2
Category: Player vs. Player

227989.name: Cruel Gladiator's Storm Dragon
227989.description: Born in the mountains of Stormheim, this terrifying fusion of storm and scale sets the sky ablaze in pursuit of its prey.
227989.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Legion Season 3
Category: Player vs. Player

227991.name: Ferocious Gladiator's Storm Dragon
227991.description: Born in the mountains of Stormheim, this terrifying fusion of storm and scale sets the sky ablaze in pursuit of its prey.
227991.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Legion Season 4
Category: Player vs. Player

227994.name: Fierce Gladiator's Storm Dragon
227994.description: Born in the mountains of Stormheim, this terrifying fusion of storm and scale sets the sky ablaze in pursuit of its prey.
227994.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Legion Season 5
Category: Player vs. Player

227995.name: Dominant Gladiator's Storm Dragon
227995.description: Born in the mountains of Stormheim, this terrifying fusion of storm and scale sets the sky ablaze in pursuit of its prey.
227995.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Legion Season 6
Category: Player vs. Player

228919.name: Darkwater Skate
228919.description: Little is known about this elusive species of ray, found only in the dark waters surrounding Darkmoon Island.
228919.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Galissa Sundew
Zone: Darkmoon Island

229376.name: Archmage's Prismatic Disc
229376.description: Three elements have been fused to create this magical disc, which is attuned to your specific magical powers.

229377.name: High Priest's Lightsworn Seeker
229377.description: Once plentiful, only three seekers remain on Azeroth after generations of battling the corruption of the cosmos.

229385.name: Ban-Lu, Grandmaster's Companion
229385.description: The child of Xuen, Ban-Lu has served each Grandmaster faithfully for many years.

229386.name: Huntmaster's Loyal Wolfhawk
229386.description: The spirit of the Great Hunter found you worthy, and now its children will answer your call forevermore.

229387.name: Deathlord's Vilebrood Vanquisher
229387.description: A powerful red dragon raised in undeath by its own life energies, a true mockery of life.

229417.name: Slayer's Felbroken Shrieker
229417.description: You broke it, you bought it.

229438.name: Huntmaster's Fierce Wolfhawk
229438.description: A jumble of talons and claws that can fly and swim. No one is safe.
229438.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Pan the Kind Hand
Zone: Trueshot Lodge

229439.name: Huntmaster's Dire Wolfhawk
229439.description: If asked to fetch, will most likely bring you back the head of a small mammal or humanoid.
229439.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Pan the Kind Hand
Zone: Trueshot Lodge

229486.name: Vicious War Bear
229486.description: Nearly twice as vicious as its Alliance counterpart.
229486.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Deathguard Netharian
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

229487.name: Vicious War Bear
229487.description: Almost twice as vicious as its Horde counterpart.
229487.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Necrolord Sipe
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 1

229499.name: Midnight
229499.description: Still one of the most vicious steeds stabled in Karazhan.
229499.sourceDesc:
Drop: Attumen the Huntsman
Location: Return to Karazhan

229512.name: Vicious War Lion
229512.description: Many squires were harmed in the making of this mount.
229512.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Necrolord Sipe
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 1

230401.name: Ivory Hawkstrider
230401.description:
"My winged children fill the skies. Not this one though."

-Aviana
230401.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Trinket
Zone: Highmountain
Cost: 10000

230844.name: Brawler's Burly Basilisk
230844.description: The spikes on this beast can pierce plate armor with ease -- only the most elite riders can even consider mounting this deadly pincushion.
230844.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Quackenbush
Zone: Deeprun Tram
Cost: 4000

Vendor: Paul North
Zone: Brawl'gar Arena
Cost: 4000

230987.name: Arcanist's Manasaber
230987.description:
Upon her return to The Nighthold, First Arcanist Thalyssra saw to it that adventurers who helped her liberate Suramar were rewarded with prized mounts from the royal stable.

Summoning this mount in Suramar City will also apply Masquerade.
230987.sourceDesc:
Quest: Fate of the Nightborne
Zone: Suramar

230988.name: Vicious War Scorpion
230988.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Deathguard Netharian
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

231428.name: Smoldering Ember Wyrm
231428.description: Arcanagos sought to turn Medivh away from experiments into the arcane, but the influence of Sargeras had corrupted the wizard too deeply, and the great dragon paid for the transgression with eternal, burning agony.

231434.name: Shadowblade's Murderous Omen
231434.description: The preferred vehicle for assassinations, they make no sounds when flying - really great for sneaking up on people.

231435.name: Highlord's Golden Charger
231435.description: The fanciest of all of the horses.

231525.name: Shadowblade's Crimson Omen
231525.description: The blood of your enemies won't even show up, blends right in.

231587.name: Highlord's Vengeful Charger
231587.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Crusader Lord Dalfors
Zone: Sanctum of Light

231588.name: Highlord's Vigilant Charger
231588.description: His blank horse stare is "vigilance," actually.
231588.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Crusader Lord Dalfors
Zone: Sanctum of Light

231589.name: Highlord's Valorous Charger
231589.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Crusader Lord Dalfors
Zone: Sanctum of Light

232405.name: Primal Flamesaber
232405.description: The primal landscape of Azeroth was once swarming with elemental creatures of all types.

232412.name: Netherlord's Chaotic Wrathsteed
232412.description: A deadly combination of fel and horse.

232519.name: Abyss Worm
232519.description: The shadows that trail off of its scales are otherworldly, is this creature from the depths of Azeroth's oceans?
232519.sourceDesc:
Drop: Mistress Sassz'ine
Location: Tomb of Sargeras

232523.name: Vicious War Turtle
232523.description: Now you can literally turtle up in the flag room.
232523.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Necrolord Sipe
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 1

232525.name: Vicious War Turtle
232525.description: Now you can literally turtle up in the flag room.
232525.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Deathguard Netharian
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

233364.name: Leywoven Flying Carpet
233364.description: The threads are so thin and well-stitched, you can't imagine it wasn't made by magic, strand by strand.

235764.name: Darkspore Mana Ray
235764.description: Some of the natural wildlife of Argus, like the mana ray, has survived and adapted to life on the shattered world.

237286.name: Dune Scavenger
237286.description: These resilient scavengers can survive for months in the wastes of Vol'dun with scarce access to food and water.

237287.name: Alabaster Hyena
237287.description: These hyena are used by the Voldunai to quickly move unseen throughout the sands.
237287.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Hoarder Jena
Zone: Vol'dun
Faction: Voldunai - Exalted
Cost: 10000

238452.name: Netherlord's Brimstone Wrathsteed
238452.description: The smell isn't particularly pleasant, and it REALLY stays with you.

238454.name: Netherlord's Accursed Wrathsteed
238454.description: Shadow plus fire, what could go wrong?
238454.sourceDesc:
Drop: Lord Hel'Nurath
Zone: Broken Shore

239013.name: Lightforged Warframe
239013.description: The Army of the Light conducts quick, brutal hit-and-run attacks using these agile war machines.
239013.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Vindicator Jaelaana
Zone: Argus
Faction: Army of the Light - Exalted
Cost: 625000

239049.name: Obsidian Krolusk
239049.description: This krolusk is marked with proof of surviving scores of trials and hardships.
239049.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Wartorn Hero
Category: Dungeons & Raids

239363.name: Swift Spectral Hippogryph
239363.description: Even the dead need a lift every now and then.

239766.name: Blue Qiraji War Tank
239766.description: The Qiraji War Tank has only been seen recently during the Call of the Scarab, could this hint at a resurfacing of the deadly creatures?
239766.sourceDesc: World Event: Call of the Scarab

239767.name: Red Qiraji War Tank
239767.description: The Qiraji War Tank has only been seen recently during the Call of the Scarab, could this hint at a resurfacing of the deadly creatures?
239767.sourceDesc: World Event: Call of the Scarab

239770.name: Black Qiraji War Tank
239770.description: The Qiraji War Tank has only been seen recently during the Call of the Scarab, could this hint at a resurfacing of the deadly creatures?

242305.name: Sable Ruinstrider
242305.description: Talbuks, native to Argus, have evolved chitinous plates to survive the decades of ceaseless war that ravages the landscape.
242305.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Toraan the Revered
Zone: Argus
Faction: Argussian Reach - Exalted
Cost: 10000

242874.name: Highmountain Elderhorn
242874.description: The favored mount of Highmountain hunters, they can easily leap across the rushing rivers of Pinerock Basin even when saddled with a full-sized Tauren.

242875.name: Wild Dreamrunner
242875.description: Dreamrunners flit between this world and the Emerald Dream at will, reveling in their wild nature.

242881.name: Cloudwing Hippogryph
242881.description: Moreso than normal hippogryphs, the cloudwings of Azsuna prefer to nest high up in mountain caves far above the cloud line.

242882.name: Valarjar Stormwing
242882.description: The beating of its wings sound like the rolling of thunder in the distance.

242896.name: Vicious War Fox
242896.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Necrolord Sipe
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 1

242897.name: Vicious War Fox
242897.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Deathguard Netharian
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

243025.name: Riddler's Mind-Worm
243025.description: It feeds on your thoughts, even the ones you are thinking as you read this.

243201.name: Demonic Gladiator's Storm Dragon
243201.description: Born in the mountains of Stormheim, this terrifying fusion of storm and scale sets the sky ablaze in pursuit of its prey.
243201.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Legion Season 7
Category: Player vs. Player

243512.name: Luminous Starseeker
243512.description: Energetic apex hunters of Argus, the panthara hunt by sensing the energy within living things. A panthara approaching a powerful energy source will visibly change color and become more excited.

243651.name: Shackled Ur'zul
243651.description: Formed from the tormented bodies and souls of fallen members of the Army of the Light, the Ur'zul is both fascinating and horrifying.

243652.name: Vile Fiend
243652.description: Infused with acidic blood through a terrifying ritual, you can feel your control over this beast is tenuous at best.
243652.sourceDesc:
<span style="color: #FFD200">Drop: Houndmaster Kerrax
<span style="color: #FFD200">Zone: Antoran Wastes

243795.name: Leaping Veinseeker
243795.description: Bug spray and a hat with netting aren't going to do much in the swamps of Nazmir, bring a club.

244712.name: Spectral Pterrorwing
244712.description: Vengeful spectres abound in the spirit realm surrounding Dazar'alor.
244712.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Natal'hakata
Zone: Zuldazar
Faction: Zandalari Empire - Exalted
Cost: 90000

245723.name: Stormwind Skychaser
245723.description: "Give me all the engines you got." - Engineer Cogspinner

245725.name: Orgrimmar Interceptor
245725.description: A forward-mounted wolf's head cannon makes this air superiority fighter especially good at dogfighting.

247402.name: Lucid Nightmare
247402.description: When riding this mount, your thoughts often wander to far-off places.

247448.name: Darkmoon Dirigible
247448.description: Silas considered using his fleet of blimps for marketing, but decided that selling them directly was all the marketing he needed.
247448.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Lhara
Zone: Darkmoon Island
Cost: 1000

250735.name: Bloodgorged Crawg
250735.description: This crawg was left alone to feast on G'huun's corrupted blood and rot. He was so happy.
250735.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Uldir Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

253004.name: Amethyst Ruinstrider
253004.description: Talbuks, native to Argus, have evolved chitinous plates to survive the decades of ceaseless war that ravages the landscape.

Zone: Argus
Faction: Argussian Reach - Exalted
Cost: 10000

253058.name: Maddened Chaosrunner
253058.description: The Army of the Light could only save so many of Argus' native species; countless numbers were lost to chaos.

253087.name: Antoran Gloomhound
253087.description: Sargeras' own hound was maybe once a felstalker, but over the years the Dark Titan reforged and reshaped his companion into something much more powerful. When, at last, he was pleased with his creation, he set about creating more of the hounds, and imbuing them with shadow and flame.
253087.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Argus Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

253088.name: Antoran Charhound
253088.description: Sargeras' own hound was maybe once a felstalker, but over the years the Dark Titan reforged and reshaped his companion into something much more powerful. When, at last, he was pleased with his creation, he set about creating more of the hounds, and imbuing them with shadow and flame.
253088.sourceDesc:
Drop: Shatug
Zone: Antorus, the Burning Throne

253106.name: Vibrant Mana Ray
253106.description: Some of the natural wildlife of Argus, like the mana ray, has survived and adapted to life on the shattered world.

253107.name: Lambent Mana Ray
253107.description: Some of the natural wildlife of Argus, like the mana ray, has survived and adapted to life on the shattered world.

253108.name: Felglow Mana Ray
253108.description: The Army of the Light could only save so many of Argus' native species; countless numbers were lost to chaos.

253109.name: Scintillating Mana Ray
253109.description: Some of the natural wildlife of Argus, like the mana ray, has survived and adapted to life on the shattered world.

253639.name: Violet Spellwing
253639.description: A gift from the Council of Six for saving Azeroth from the threat of the Legion once more.
253639.sourceDesc:
Quest: Blood of a Titan
Zone: Dalaran

253660.name: Biletooth Gnasher
253660.description: Its bite is definitely worse than its bark-like gurgling sound.

253661.name: Crimson Slavermaw
253661.description: Answers to a series of noises that cannot be made by non-demonic creatures but roughly translates to "Deathslobber."

253662.name: Acid Belcher
253662.description: Twice as acid-filled as the usual fiend.
253662.sourceDesc:
Drop: Skreeg the Devourer
Zone: Eredath

253711.name: Pond Nettle
253711.description: This miraculous aquatic species can survive in the harshest environments, perhaps even the void of space.

254069.name: Glorious Felcrusher
254069.description: After Alleria and Turalyon explained the usefulness of the Draenei's long-time companion animal, the Army of the Light brought several into the fold for training.

254258.name: Blessed Felcrusher
254258.description: After Alleria and Turalyon explained the usefulness of the Draenei's long-time companion animal, the Army of the Light brought several into the fold for training.

254259.name: Avenging Felcrusher
254259.description: After Alleria and Turalyon explained the usefulness of the Draenei's long-time companion animal, the Army of the Light brought several into the fold for training.

254260.name: Bleakhoof Ruinstrider
254260.description: The Army of the Light could only save so many of Argus' native species; countless numbers were lost to chaos.
254260.sourceDesc:
<span style="color: #FFD200">Achievement: ...And Chew Mana Buns
<span style="color: #FFD200">Category: Legion

254471.name: Valorous Charger
254471.description: Redeemed by the Light. Devoted to your cause.

254472.name: Vengeful Charger
254472.description: Redeemed by the Light. Devoted to your cause.

254473.name: Vigilant Charger
254473.description: Redeemed by the Light. Devoted to your cause.

254474.name: Golden Charger
254474.description: Redeemed by the Light. Devoted to your cause.

254811.name: Squawks
254811.description: Guess why he's called that? It's not because he's a nice, quiet pet.

254813.name: Sharkbait
254813.description: Sharkbait's loyalty lies with whomever keeps the crackers coming.
254813.sourceDesc:
Drop: Harlan Sweete
Zone: Freehold (Mythic)

Treasure: Challenger's Cache
Zone: Freehold

255695.name: Seabraid Stallion
255695.description: Horses in the Kul Tiran military are bred from an early age not to fear the sea, and revel in galloping along the shoreline and through the spray.
255695.sourceDesc: Promotion: Battle for Azeroth Collector's Edition

255696.name: Gilded Ravasaur
255696.description: A mount fit for Zandalari high priests and councilers, gilded with only the finest decoration and blessed by Rezan, the great devilsaur loa.
255696.sourceDesc: Promotion: Battle for Azeroth Collector's Edition

256123.name: Xiwyllag ATV
256123.description: It was said that this invention was modeled after the likeness of a very wealthy goblin. Although others don't really see the resemblance.

258022.name: Lightforged Felcrusher
258022.description: A gift of thanks from the Lightforged draenei, this stalwart elekk is conditioned to charge headlong into darkness without fear.

258060.name: Highmountain Thunderhoof
258060.description: A gift from the tauren who trained this sure-footed highland moose to safely traverse the paths and peaks of Highmountain.

258845.name: Nightborne Manasaber
258845.description: Born capable of sniffing out concentrations of arcane energy, this noble cat was presented with thanks to a proven ally of the nightborne.

259202.name: Starcursed Voidstrider
259202.description: This shadow-infused strider embodies the elves' commitment to harness the power of the Void in the name of the Alliance.

259213.name: Admiralty Stallion
259213.description: These sleek white stallions are the few mounts allowed to embark on Kul Tiran ships.
259213.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Provisioner Fray
Zone: Tiragarde Sound
Faction: Proudmoore Admiralty - Exalted
Cost: 10000

259395.name: Shu-Zen, the Divine Sentinel
259395.description: As the Golden Lotus worked tirelessly to repair the Vale of Eternal Blossoms, a single statue came to life and wordlessly defended them from the Sha that assaulted them. Believed by some to be a sign of good fortune and others to be a gift from the Light, Shu-Zen provides faithful companionship to any that would defend Azeroth from the maddening whispers of the Old Gods.

259740.name: Green Marsh Hopper
259740.description: Gottum collects spawns of Krag'wa from all around the Frogmarsh, but only the most bulbous are used as mounts.
259740.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Gottum
Zone: Nazmir
Cost: 333333

259741.name: Honeyback Harvester
259741.description: While most Harvesters dream only of honey and flowers, this adventurous specimen looks to the wide world beyond Stormsong Valley.
259741.sourceDesc:
Quest: Leaving the Hive: Harvester
Zone: Stormsong Valley

260172.name: Dapple Gray
260172.description: A favored mount of the sea priests who call Stormsong home.
260172.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Sister Lilyana
Zone: Stormsong Valley
Faction: Storm's Wake - Exalted
Cost: 10000

260173.name: Smoky Charger
260173.description: Among the oldest horse breeds in Kul Tiras, they even led many a charge in the original struggle with the drust.
260173.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Quartermaster Alcorn
Zone: Drustvar
Faction: Order of Embers - Exalted
Cost: 10000

260174.name: Terrified Pack Mule
260174.description: This poor mule was around Drustvar when the witches took over. He's seen too much.

260175.name: Goldenmane
260175.description: Lord Stormsong ordered his cronies to steal this horse from the Norwington Estate in Tiragarde, as he was covetous of its luscious golden mane.

261433.name: Vicious War Basilisk
261433.description: Its breath is worse than its bite.
261433.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Necrolord Sipe
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 1

261434.name: Vicious War Basilisk
261434.description: Its breath is worse than its bite.
261434.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Deathguard Netharian
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

261437.name: Mecha-Mogul Mk2
261437.description: The Mk2 is an updated design with a focus on comfort and reliability over firepower.

262022.name: Dread Gladiator's Proto-Drake
262022.description: They say that proto-drakes can smell fear. This iron-bound monster FEEDS off of it.
262022.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Battle for Azeroth Season 1
Category: Player vs. Player

262023.name: Sinister Gladiator's Proto-Drake

263707.name: Zandalari Direhorn
263707.description: The Zandalari pride themselves on being the first to raise and train all of the most ferocious lizards on Azeroth.

264058.name: Mighty Caravan Brutosaur
264058.description: Brutosaurs are used by the Zandalari Empire as both weapons of war and enormous, mobile trading posts.
264058.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Talutu
Zone: Zuldazar
Cost: 5000000

Vendor: Tricky Nick
Zone: Tiragarde Sound

Treasure: Challenger's Cache
Zone: Kings' Rest

266925.name: Siltwing Albatross
266925.description: One of the rarest of birds seen on the islands of the Great Sea, and a prized possession amongst traders, if they can capture it.
266925.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Captain Klarisa
Zone: Tiragarde Sound

Vendor: Captain Zen'taga
Zone: Zuldazar

267270.name: Kua'fon
267270.description: Once a little hatchling, raised into a mighty pterrordax by a loving handler. He never did learn to fly.
267270.sourceDesc:
Quest: Down, But Not Out
Zone: Zuldazar

267274.name: Mag'har Direwolf
267274.description: Native to Draenor, these wolves are preferred by the Mag'har for their ferocity, loyalty, and for something to snuggle on those cool winter nights.

270560.name: Vicious War Clefthoof
270560.description: The Mag'har bred clefthooves not only as sturdy pack animals, but also powerful instruments of war.
270560.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Deathguard Netharian
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

270562.name: Darkforge Ram
270562.description: A loyal steed to the defenders of Ironforge.

270564.name: Dawnforge Ram
270564.description: A loyal steed to the defenders of Ironforge.

271646.name: Dark Iron Core Hound
271646.description: You don't get dogs hotter than this.
271646.sourceDesc: <span style="color: #FFD200">Achievement: Allied Races: Dark Iron Dwarf

272472.name: Undercity Plaguebat
272472.description: One of the last of the giant bats to escape Undercity following the siege of Lordaeron.

272481.name: Vicious War Riverbeast
272481.description: Riverbeasts are actually one of the most dangerous animals on Azeroth, despite their appearance.
272481.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Necrolord Sipe
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 1

272770.name: The Dreadwake
272770.description: A ship unlike any other, held aloft by a gift from an unknown kraken-faced god of the deeps.

273541.name: Underrot Crawg
273541.description: The eternal twilight of the Underrot has robbed this crawg of all pigmentation.
273541.sourceDesc:
Drop: Unbound Abomination
Zone: The Underrot (Mythic)

Treasure: Challenger's Cache
Zone: The Underrot

274610.name: Teldrassil Hippogryph
274610.description: One of the last of the great armored hippogryphs to escape the burning of Teldrassil, it carried the last few citizens it could to safety before collapsing of exhaustion.

275623.name: Nazjatar Blood Serpent
275623.description: Monstrous serpents riddled with corruption serve as mounts for N'zoth's high-ranking lieutenants in the Great Sea.
275623.sourceDesc:
Drop: Adherent of the Abyss
Zone: Stormsong Valley

275837.name: Cobalt Pterrordax
275837.description: These pterrordax keep vigil for enemy fleets soaring above the coasts of Zandalar.
275837.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Natal'hakata
Zone: Zuldazar
Faction: Zandalari Empire - Exalted
Cost: 10000

275838.name: Captured Swampstalker
275838.description: A swamp-dwelling subspecies of pterrordax known to feast on young bloodfeasters.
275838.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Provisioner Lija
Zone: Nazmir
Faction: Talanji's Expedition - Exalted
Cost: 90000

275840.name: Voldunai Dunescraper
275840.description: These brightly-colored fliers are rarely captured in the wild due to their naturally untrusting natures.
275840.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Hoarder Jena
Zone: Vol'dun
Faction: Voldunai - Exalted
Cost: 90000

275841.name: Expedition Bloodswarmer
275841.description: Orphaned during the rout of the Blood Trolls, this bloodswarmer has been retrained by Talanji's handlers.
275841.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Provisioner Lija
Zone: Nazmir
Faction: Talanji's Expedition - Exalted
Cost: 10000

275859.name: Dusky Waycrest Gryphon
275859.description: Common to the dark forests of Drustvar, these gryphon are silent and swift. Their prowess at operating on their own or as mounts lends them to be used for ambush and shock tactics.
275859.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Quartermaster Alcorn
Zone: Drustvar
Faction: Order of Embers - Exalted
Cost: 90000

275866.name: Stormsong Coastwatcher
275866.description: Tasked with keeping watch on the seas for approaching dangers, the Stormsong Coastwatchers fly constant patrols.
275866.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Sister Lilyana
Zone: Stormsong Valley
Faction: Storm's Wake - Exalted
Cost: 90000

275868.name: Proudmoore Sea Scout
275868.description: Only a few gryphons are selected to be Sea Scouts operating from flag ships in the fleet. Their long range reconnaissance is an integral part of Kul Tiran sea dominance.
275868.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Provisioner Fray
Zone: Tiragarde Sound
Faction: Proudmoore Admiralty - Exalted
Cost: 90000

278803.name: Great Sea Ray
278803.description: The rays of the great sea can travel for many miles in great migratory patterns.

278979.name: Surf Jelly
278979.description: The time between being stung and being enveloped and devoured is short enough to consider not swimming in the Great Sea.

279454.name: Conqueror's Scythemaw
279454.description: The battle-hardened shell of this mighty beast can turn aside even the most hefty hammer or sharpened spear.
279454.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Conqueror of Azeroth
Category: World

279456.name: Highland Mustang
279456.description: A valiant steed on the Arathi Highlands, it knows no fear.
279456.sourceDesc:
Drop: Doomrider Helgrim
Zone: Arathi Highlands

279457.name: Broken Highland Mustang
279457.description: One of the Arathi horses, taken and broken by the Horde conquerors of Stromgarde.
279457.sourceDesc:
Drop: Knight-Captain Aldrin
Zone: Arathi Highlands

279466.name: Twilight Avenger
279466.description: Little is known about the fate of the twilight dragonflight, though they seem to exist in numbers in Grim Batol to this day.

279467.name: Craghorn Chasm-Leaper
279467.description: These mighty leapers have adapted to island life by learning to catch seagulls swooping through crags and fissures.

279469.name: Qinsho's Eternal Hound
279469.description: Qinsho wrought his eternal guardian from pure gold and imbued it with the resilience of the earth.

279474.name: Palehide Direhorn
279474.description: Pale-skinned direhorns are quite rare, justifying the expense.
279474.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Talutu
Zone: Zuldazar
Cost: 500000

Vendor: Tricky Nick
Zone: Tiragarde Sound
Cost: 500000

279569.name: Swift Albino Raptor
279569.description: The Witherbark warrior Beastrider Kama once cut bloody swathes of terror across the Arathi Highlands astride such a monster.
279569.sourceDesc:
Drop: Beastrider Kama
Zone: Arathi Highlands

279608.name: Lil' Donkey
279608.description: Likely stolen from Newstead in the Arathi Highlands, this stalwart little donkey was destined to be eaten by kobolds.
279608.sourceDesc:
Drop: Overseer Krix
Zone: Arathi Highlands

279868.name: Witherbark Direwing
279868.description: Only a handful of these giant bats remain in the Arathi Highlands, carefully raised by the Witherbark forest trolls who first brought them here.
279868.sourceDesc:
Drop: Nimar the Slayer
Zone: Arathi Highlands

280729.name: Frenzied Feltalon
280729.description: The Legion experimented with the corruption of many different types of wildlife, such as this fiery bird species from a molten world.
280729.sourceDesc:
Achievement: A Horde of Hoofbeats
Category: Mounts

280730.name: Pureheart Courser
280730.description: These coursers have long been known to exist, but only befriend those that have gone to great lengths for friendship.

281044.name: Prestigious Bloodforged Courser
281044.description: Forged in a fiery hatred, the offspring of a nightmare and a dream, this steed feeds on grains grown with the tears of your enemies.

281554.name: Meat Wagon
281554.description: A favorite unit of the Lich King, both for its power as a siege weapon, and the satisfying sound of flung meat.

281887.name: Vicious Black Warsaber
281887.description: The only thing these big cats bring home as gifts are the severed limbs of your enemies.
281887.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Necrolord Sipe
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 1

281888.name: Vicious White Warsaber
281888.description: If you try to give it a belly scratch, you're asking for trouble.
281888.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Necrolord Sipe
Zone: Stormwind City
Cost: 1

281889.name: Vicious White Bonesteed
281889.description: There are few other ways to ride in to battle that feature as many spikes and bones.
281889.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Deathguard Netharian
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

281890.name: Vicious Black Bonesteed
281890.description: These skeletal steeds know no fear, eat no grains, and can travel impossible distances.
281890.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Deathguard Netharian
Zone: Orgrimmar
Cost: 1

282682.name: Kul Tiran Charger
282682.description: The Kul Tiran military prides itself on mastery of both sea, through a vast navy, and land, with armed cavalry.
282682.sourceDesc: <span style="color: #FFD200">Achievement: Allied Races: Kul Tiran Human

288438.name: Blackpaw
288438.description: Blackpaw was just hibernating, minding his own business, and then suddenly there was a warfront.
288438.sourceDesc:
Drop: Agathe Wyrmwood
Zone: Darkshore

Drop: Blackpaw
Zone: Darkshore

288495.name: Ashenvale Chimaera
288495.description: Ashenvale chimaeras were used frequently by the Kaldorei to decimate structures in battles against the humans, orcs, and undead.

288499.name: Frightened Kodo
288499.description: Nothing frightens a kodo like seeing a bear with antlers.

288503.name: Umber Nightsaber
288503.description: Nightsabers are an integral part of the Kaldorei's army, serving as both mount and assault weapon in one.
288503.sourceDesc:
Drop: Moxo the Beheader
Zone: Darkshore

Drop: Athil Dewfire
Zone: Darkshore

288505.name: Kaldorei Nightsaber
288505.description: The connection between a nightsaber and its hunter or huntress is nearly inseparable.
288505.sourceDesc:
Drop: Croz Bloodrage
Zone: Darkshore

Drop: Shadowclaw
Zone: Darkshore

288506.name: Sandy Nightsaber
288506.description: A rare color for a nightsaber, and rarely seen, they are prized amongst huntresses.
288506.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Provisioner Stoutforge

Cost: 350

Zone: Zuldazar
Cost: 350

Zone: Zuldazar
Cost: 350

288587.name: Blue Marsh Hopper
288587.description: That squishing sound every time it takes a step? That's a feature.
288587.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Gottum
Zone: Nazmir
Cost: 333333

288589.name: Yellow Marsh Hopper
288589.description: No one makes giant, slimy spawns like Krag'wa the Huge.
288589.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Gottum
Zone: Nazmir
Cost: 333333

288711.name: Saltwater Seahorse

288711.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Captain Klarisa

288712.name: Stonehide Elderhorn
288712.description: Stonehide elderhorns, one of the few types of moose to inhabit island climates, have thinner fur than most elderhorns.

288714.name: Bloodthirsty Dreadwing
288714.description: The forsaken prefer the use of these bloodthirsty hunters, both for their speed as a mount, and the psychological effect they have on their enemies.
288714.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Provisioner Mukra

Cost: 750

288720.name: Bloodgorged Hunter
288720.description: If he wasn't so full, you wouldn't have caught him.

288721.name: Island Thunderscale
288721.description: One of the larger native dragon species on Azeroth, this subspecies subsists almost entirely on fish. And fishermen.

288722.name: Risen Mare
288722.description: Something terrible happened in the lost town of Havenswood.

288735.name: Rubyshell Krolusk
288735.description: Captured from the desolate sands of Vol'dun, this mount is surprisingly docile in captivity.
288735.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Provisioner Mukra
Zone: Zuldazar
Cost: 200

288736.name: Azureshell Krolusk
288736.description: Captured from the desolate sands of Vol'dun, this mount is surprisingly docile in captivity.
288736.sourceDesc:
