Zone: Tiragarde Sound
Cost: 200

288740.name: Priestess' Moonsaber
288740.description: Once these elegant cats were only given to high-ranking priestesses of Elune, but now they ride into battle with all manner of champion, in the service of vengeance.
288740.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Provisioner Stoutforge
Zone: Tiragarde Sound
Cost: 750

289083.name: G.M.O.D.
289083.description: Garishly sporting extreme amounts of goblin flair, Gallywix commissioned his Mech of Death to one up Mekkatorque in combat and more importantly in style.
289083.sourceDesc:
Drop: High Tinker Mekkatorque
Zone: Battle of Dazar'alor

289101.name: Dazar'alor Windreaver
289101.description: Soaring high above the Battle of Dazar'alor, these beasts are drawn to the most cunning of victors.
289101.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Dazar'alor Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

289555.name: Glacial Tidestorm
289555.description: Though she commands a variety of magical powers, Jaina has always been most proficient at summoning powerful elementals of water and ice.
289555.sourceDesc:
Drop: Jaina Proudmoore (Mythic)
Zone: Battle of Dazar'alor

289639.name: Bruce
289639.sourceDesc: <span style="color: #FFD200">Quest: Complete the Brawler's Guild Questline

290132.name: Sylverian Dreamer
290132.description: An artist in the magical city of Dalaran fell asleep on her brush, and dreamed of painting a beautiful feathered dragon. Her artwork lept from the page, and when she awoke, she found it sleeping gently beside her.

290133.name: Vulpine Familiar
290133.description: A fiercely intelligent and curious species, these fox-like creatures have travelled the Great Dark Beyond and found their way to Azeroth. Drawn to Azeroth's champions, they seek adventure and companionship.

290134.name: Hogrus, Swine of Good Fortune
290134.description: Hogrus was first seen by Emperor Shaohao on the third day of his meditation, and is considered by the Pandaren to be a sign of good fortune to come to those who take action.

290328.name: Wonderwing 2.0
290328.description: Don't ask what happened to the first one -- Mechagon technology is still gnome technology!
290328.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Battle for Azeroth Pathfinder, Part Two
Category: Battle for Azeroth

290608.name: Crusader's Direhorn
290608.description: A loyal steed to the holy crusaders of Zandalar.

290718.name: Aerial Unit R-21/X
290718.description: King Mechagon's private aerial unit, complete with deployable blast cannon and foot warmers.

291492.name: Rusty Mechanocrawler
291492.description: The check engine light is always on, it's when it goes off that you should be worried.

291538.name: Unshackled Waveray
291538.description: The Unshackled have a natural kinship with the species of the deep seas that have seen cruelty at the hands of the naga.
291538.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Finder Pruc
Zone: Nazjatar
Faction: Unshackled - Exalted
Cost: 250

292407.name: Ankoan Waveray
292407.description: The Ankoan have been battling the naga for years, and with a natural affinity for the sea, training the local wildlife was a natural strategy.
292407.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Artisan Okata
Zone: Nazjatar
Faction: Ankoan - Exalted
Cost: 250

292419.name: Azshari Bloatray
292419.description: The naga raised these rays in captivity, harvesting their gas organs to craft alchemy which allowed them to breathe air more easily.
292419.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Eternal Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

294038.name: Royal Snapdragon
294038.description: Captured at a young age and raised to serve naga hunters, snapdragons are loyal and fierce companions.
294038.sourceDesc:
Drop: Ankoan Supplies
Drop: Unshackled Supplies

294039.name: Snapback Scuttler
294039.description: Giant crabs are native to Nazjatar and a favored food of the naga. This one must have been well-kept to grow this large.
294039.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Undersea Usurper
Category: Battle for Azeroth

294143.name: X-995 Mechanocat
294143.description: The X-995 is the ultimate in customizeable feline robo-companionship.

294197.name: Obsidian Worldbreaker
294197.description: "I have had many names throughout history, all of them spoken with dread: Neltharion, Xaxas, and many more. Yet you shall know me best as Deathwing, for so I am! I am the bane of life, the darkness within history, the lord of death, the master of destruction. And I tell you now, and so it is true, that this world is mine!" - Neltharion, the Earth-Warder
294197.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Memories of Fel, Frost and Fire
Category: Events

294568.name: Beastlord's Irontusk
294568.description: One of Darmac's trained beasts, its tusks can pierce even the hardest Iron Horde steel.
294568.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Kronnus
Zone: Warspear
Cost: 5000

Vendor: Tempra
Zone: Stormshield
Cost: 5000

Vendor: Tempra
Zone: Stormshield
Cost: 5000

294569.name: Beastlord's Warwolf
294569.description: One of Darmac's trained beasts, it was raised in a crucible of molten fire and shows no fear.
294569.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Kronnus
Zone: Warspear
Cost: 5000

Vendor: Tempra
Zone: Stormshield
Cost: 5000

Vendor: Tempra
Zone: Stormshield
Cost: 5000

295386.name: Ironclad Frostclaw
295386.description: Captured in the snows of Alterac Valley, this bloodthirsty hunter now roars for the Alliance.
295386.sourceDesc: <span style="color: #FFD200">Achievement: Two Sides to Every Tale

295387.name: Bloodflank Charger
295387.description: Stolen from the Arathi Basin stables, this fire-hearted charger now steeds for the Horde.
295387.sourceDesc: Achievement: Two Sides to Every Tale

296788.name: Mechacycle Model W
296788.description: The rapid technological evolution of the descendents of Mimiron began with the introduction of a new gear, leading to such wonders as the tragically under-produced Model W.
296788.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Mecha-Done
Category: Battle for Azeroth

297157.name: Junkheap Drifter
297157.description: When you really want to be noticed... and don't mind strapping yourself to a giant, barely-held-together wheel.

297560.name: Child of Torcali
297560.description: This daughter of the great direhorn loa, Torcali, never lost faith that her keeper would help her grow to her full potential.
297560.sourceDesc:
Quest: Wander Not Alone
Zone: Zuldazar

298367.name: Mollie
298367.description: The kind nature of alpacas makes them perfect as companions for the intrepid adventurer.

299158.name: Mechagon Peacekeeper
299158.description: Keeps the peace by turning you into pieces.
299158.sourceDesc:
Drop: HK-8 Aerial Oppression Unit
Zone: Operation: Mechagon (Mythic)

299159.name: Scrapforged Mechaspider
299159.description: You built this yourself, you should be proud, even though it's smoky, sparky, and loud.
299159.sourceDesc:
Quest: Drive It Away Today
Zone: Mechagon

299170.name: Rustbolt Resistor
299170.description: "R E S I S T" is carved into the seat in crude letters, along with several, more profane things.
299170.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Stolen Royal Vendorbot
Zone: Mechagon
Faction: Rustbolt Resistance - Exalted
Cost: 524288

300146.name: Snapdragon Kelpstalker
300146.description: When a snapdragon bites you, the worry isn't about the bite itself, but the poison that will begin to eat away at the wound.

300147.name: Deepcoral Snapdragon
300147.description: The snapdragon is a quiet hunter in the water, but is far less stealthy on land.

300149.name: Silent Glider
300149.description: Gasses naturally stored within the creature allowed it to survive within the depths, those same gasses also allow them to effortlessly float through the air.

300150.name: Fabious
300150.description: He emerges from the water, fins swaying lazily in the breeze, sun-kissed scales glittering. He is... Fabious.

300151.name: Inkscale Deepseeker
300151.description: Schools of tidestallions will viciously slam their muscular chests into their prey to take them down.
300151.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Crafticus Mindbender
Zone: Nazjatar
Cost: 150

Vendor: Dazzerian
Zone: Nazjatar
Cost: 150

Vendor: Dazzerian
Zone: Nazjatar
Cost: 150

300153.name: Crimson Tidestallion
300153.description: The blood-red coloration of these creatures is ideal for hiding in large coral formations.
300153.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Mrrl
Zone: Nazjatar
Cost: 4 2 1

1

2 1

1

302143.name: Uncorrupted Voidwing
302143.description: This spawn of Vexiona, cleansed by Wrathion, comes from a flight with a fractured past and uncertain future.

302361.name: Alabaster Stormtalon
302361.description: Chiseled by the stonemasons of Stormwind, this stone gryphon symbolizes the unbending courage of the Alliance.

302362.name: Alabaster Thunderwing
302362.description: Chiseled by the stoneworkers of Orgrimmar, this stone wind rider is a symbol of the unwavering strength of the Horde.

302794.name: Swift Spectral Fathom Ray
302794.description: Even the dead need a lift every now and then.

302795.name: Swift Spectral Magnetocraft
302795.description: Even the dead need a lift every now and then.

302796.name: Swift Spectral Armored Gryphon
302796.description: Even the dead need a lift every now and then.

302797.name: Swift Spectral Pterrordax
302797.description: Even the dead need a lift every now and then.

305182.name: Black Serpent of N'Zoth
305182.description: The black serpents of N'Zoth are the harbingers of his ultimate vision becoming reality. Only those servents or enemies that can tread this space have any chance of wrangling them.
305182.sourceDesc: <span style="color: #FFD200">Achievement: Through the Depths of Visions

305592.name: Mechagon Mechanostrider
305592.description: The best mount, logically, serves multiple purposes -- sometimes you need to get places AND reach something high up once you get there.

306421.name: Frostwolf Snarler
306421.description: Raised in the Alterac Mountains by the Frostwolf Clan, trained to bite dwarves.
306421.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Alterac Valley of Olde
Category: Alterac Valley

306423.name: Caravan Hyena
306423.description: The canopy atop this dune-wanderer can be stored at your campsite, should you desire to feel the wind in your fur.

307256.name: Explorer's Jungle Hopper
307256.description: For when you're making a crash landing in the middle of an uncharted swamp because it's the only way to access that ancient temple.

307263.name: Explorer's Dunetrekker
307263.description: The surly dunetrekker can easily carry a set of explorers to the nearest ruins and back without the need to rest.

307932.name: Ensorcelled Everwyrm
307932.description: Anima is a fundamental force that infuses the Shadowlands. It flows through many creatures, but is also traded, bartered for, and fought over.

308078.name: Squeakers, the Trickster
308078.description: The locals in Halfhill swear that whenever a batch of grain is missing, a farmworking instrument is misplaced, or a bushel of berries can't be found, you can hear a mischievous squeaking, and are reminded to slow down and accept what life gives you.

308087.name: Lucky Yun
308087.description: The Pandaren believe that merely rubbing one's hands on the shiny hide of the ox will grant prosperity, the challenge is catching it.

308250.name: Stormpike Battle Ram
308250.description: Raised in the Alterac Mountains by the Stormpike Clan, trained to headbutt orcs.
308250.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Alterac Valley of Olde
Category: Alterac Valley

308814.name: Ny'alotha Allseer
308814.description: To find him, drown yourself in the Circle of Stars.
308814.sourceDesc:
Drop: N'Zoth the Corruptor
Zone: Ny'alotha, the Waking City
Difficulty: Mythic

312751.name: Clutch of Ha-Li
312751.description: The brood of Ha-Li are comfortable in the blue skies of Pandaria, hunting unsuspecting prey.
312751.sourceDesc:
Drop: Ha-Li
Zone: Vale of Eternal Blossoms

312753.name: Hopecrusher Gargon
312753.description: Once the loyal mount of a House Briarbane lord, it turned on the lord and his retinue. Members of House Briarbane now whisper of a dark Gargon lying in wait even baiting venthyr who venture through the darker parts of the Chalice District of Revendreth.

312754.name: Battle Gargon Vrednic
312754.description: Prince Renathal's loyal gargon, Vrednic has been by his side for millennia. Adorned in his Sinvyr armor, Vrednic's mere presence instills terror to all those who lay eyes on him as he ushers his rider into battle.

312759.name: Dreamlight Runestag
312759.description: Runestags are granted to those who have pledged their service to the Winter Queen and the Court of Night.

312761.name: Enchanted Dreamlight Runestag
312761.description: The majestic runestags are capable of siphoning anima from the ambient light of Ardenweald with their elaborate antlers. The anima is used as nourishment and to power the runestag's speed and magic.

312762.name: Mawsworn Soulhunter
312762.description: Soulhunters are used to track wayward souls across the wastes that flee from their dark fates, and are one of the only creatures that feel comfortable traversing the maw.
312762.sourceDesc:
Drop: Gorged Shadehound
Zone: The Maw

312763.name: Darkwarren Hardshell
312763.description: The Darkwarren Hardshell's chitin is sturdy enough to withstand mortar shells and dragon's fire. It will also conviently consume anything lacking anima, if needed.

312765.name: Sundancer
312765.description: This sun-dappled courser gallops on lightbeams with carefree abandon.

312767.name: Swift Gloomhoof
312767.description: The ballads of Ardenweald claim that the birth of gloomrunner heralds the passing of a particularly benevolent wild god. Seeing a gloomrunner is therefore a blessing and a curse.

312776.name: Chittering Animite
312776.description: These exceptionally agile fliers make excellent mounts once they've been trained not to sap every ounce of anima from their rider.

312777.name: Silvertip Dredwing
312777.description: Bred by the Revendreth prince, Renathal, these rare dredwing are fiercely loyal and will only let those deemed worthy by the prince himself to interact with them.
312777.sourceDesc:
Covenant Feature: The Ember Court
Covenant: Venthyr

Covenant Feature: Queen's Conservatory
Covenant: Night Fae

Covenant Feature: Path of Ascension
Covenant: Kyrian

Covenant Feature: Abomination Factory
Covenant: Necrolord

315014.name: Ivory Cloud Serpent
315014.description: Ivory Cloud Serpents are often mistaken for roaring thunder as they tear through the skies with blistering speed.
315014.sourceDesc:
Drop: Ivory Cloud Serpent
Zone: Vale of Eternal Blossoms

315132.name: Gargantuan Grrloc
315132.description: It's the biggest murloc you've ever seen!

315427.name: Rajani Warserpent
315427.description: Fierce companions of the followers of Ra-den, the Rajani Warserpents are a force to be reckoned with.
315427.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Zhang Ku
Zone: Vale of Eternal Blossoms
Cost: 1

315847.name: Drake of the Four Winds
315847.description: Rocks erode, fires sputter, but wind remains powerful regardless of the passage of time. -Phaoris
315847.sourceDesc:
Drop: Ishak of the Four Winds
Zone: Uldum

315987.name: Mail Muncher
315987.description: Worming its way through the Postmaster's network, this serpent of N'Zoth deprived Azeroth of its primary magical correspondence.
315987.sourceDesc:
Drop: Mail Muncher
Zone: Horrific Visions

316275.name: Waste Marauder
316275.description: Larger than most of its kin, this vulture has shown sick and strong beasts alike why they need to fear the skies.

316276.name: Wastewander Skyterror
316276.description: Doubting a Wastewander Skyterror's capabilities is a quick way to find yourself missing a limb.
316276.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Provisioner Qorra
Zone: Uldum
Faction: Uldum Accord - Exalted
Cost: 24000

316337.name: Malevolent Drone
316337.description: The Aqir drones feast on heroes and cowards alike to grow their ranks.

316339.name: Shadowbarb Drone
316339.description: Void, jelly, and a very full belly is all this drone needs.
316339.sourceDesc:
Quest: My Own Drone
Zone: Uldum

316340.name: Wicked Swarmer
316340.description: When the Void reached out, the Aqir were formed in its terrible image.
316340.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Wrathion
Zone: Chamber of Heart
Cost: 100000

316343.name: Wriggling Parasite
316343.description: It's so wiggly! Just looking at it move is chaotic and unnerving.
316343.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Ny'alotha Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

316493.name: Elusive Quickhoof
316493.description: The kind nature of alpacas makes them perfect as companions for the intrepid adventurer.

316637.name: Awakened Mindborer
316637.description: It may look menacing right now, but it's actually kind of cute when it's asleep.
316637.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Battle for Azeroth Keystone Master: Season Four
Category: Dungeons

316722.name: Ren's Stalwart Hound
316722.description: Houndlord Ren used his strongest quilen to carry him across Pandaria to subjugate the Vale for the Mogu empire.
316722.sourceDesc:
Drop: Houndlord Ren
Zone: Vale of Eternal Blossoms

316723.name: Xinlao
316723.description: The only thing stronger than a quilen's loyalty is its fierce devotion to making sure it covers its owner in kisses.
316723.sourceDesc:
Drop: Anh-De the Loyal
Zone: Vale of Eternal Blossoms

316802.name: Springfur Alpaca
316802.description: The kind nature of alpacas makes them perfect as companions for the intrepid adventurer.
316802.sourceDesc:
Quest: Alpaca It In
Zone: Uldum

317177.name: Sunwarmed Furline
317177.description: The presence of the giant felines heralds the beginning of the end for the birds of Azeroth.

318051.name: Silky Shimmermoth
318051.description: The moths of Ardenweald play a vital role in the ecosystem, carrying spores, anima, and pollen from one part of the forest to the other, providing nourishment and variation to the denizens living below.
318051.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Master Clerk Salorn
Zone: Ardenweald
Cost: 5000

326390.name: Steamscale Incinerator
326390.description: A mad gnomish inventor had a dream to ride a dragon, so he created this metal monstrosity. He powered it with a trapped demon, in order to create "an authentic dragon soul," and did not survive its activation.

327405.name: Colossal Slaughterclaw
327405.description: Only the most stalwart stable masters of Maldraxxus are able to break the will of the colossal slaughterclaws, giving all champions of the Undying Army a fearsome ally in the Shadowlands.
327405.sourceDesc:
Drop: Supplies of the Undying Army
Zone: Maldraxxus

327407.name: Vicious War Spider
327407.description: When being a courageous member of the Alliance doesn't strike the right amount of fear into your opponent, add a giant spider.
327407.sourceDesc:
PvP: Shadowlands: Season 1
Rated Arena and Rated Battleground Season Reward

327408.name: Vicious War Spider
327408.description: When being a bellowing member of the Horde doesn't strike the right amount of fear into your opponent, add a giant spider.
327408.sourceDesc:
PvP: Shadowlands: Season 1
Rated Arena and Rated Battleground Season Reward

332243.name: Shadeleaf Runestag
332243.description: The shadeleaf runestag are bred for their ferocity as well as their beauty by the Wild Hunt. They feel no fear charging into the den of any predator.

332244.name: Wakener's Runestag
332244.description: Runestags enjoy lying near wildseeds. The Wakeners believe they can hear the sleepers' dreams. These runestags display a range of emotions in their vigil, signaling the dreams or nightmares of the spirits within.

332245.name: Winterborn Runestag
332245.description: Winterborn runestags are blessed by the Winter Queen herself. Their runes flare brilliantly when predators are nearby, warning the entire herd.

332246.name: Enchanted Shadeleaf Runestag
332246.description: An shadeleaf runestag is capable of goring creatures as powerful as a gorm matriarch in defense of its herd. The Wild Hunt ride these mounts into dangerous corners of the Shadowlands, when their domain must be defended from those who would threaten the wilds.

332247.name: Enchanted Wakener's Runestag
332247.description: Wakener runestags fiercely protect their wildseed groves. When the groves starting to fail, many runestags went berserk.

332248.name: Enchanted Winterborn Runestag
332248.description: Winterborn runestags are the favored mount of the Winter Queen herself, and she only bestows such a creature on her most favored subjects.

332252.name: Shimmermist Runner
332252.description: Mischievous spriggans and the valerunners have a natural enmity. No valerunner would deign to allow a spriggan rider because they can sense their inherent malevolence. This angers the trickster spriggans who take twisted enjoyment in playing cruel pranks on these majestic creatures.

332256.name: Duskflutter Ardenmoth
332256.description: These ardenmoths prefer the dark and damp forests of northwest Ardenweald, where fungal colonies are perpetually blooming.
332256.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Aithlyn
Zone: Ardenweald
Faction: The Wild Hunt - Exalted
Cost: 30000

332400.name: Sinful Gladiator's Soul Eater
332400.description: This mount shows a proclivity for snacking upon the souls cast out of Revendreth.
332400.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Sinful Gladiator: Shadowlands Season 1
Category: Player vs. Player

332455.name: War-Bred Tauralus
332455.description: The soldiers of Maldraxxus protect the Shadowlands, and require a mount that is both capable and calm when faced with overwhelming odds.

332456.name: Plaguerot Tauralus
332456.description: The tauralus is considered courageous, though scholars of Maldraxxus have long wondered if their lack of fear is simply due to the tiny size of their brains.

332457.name: Bonehoof Tauralus
332457.description: There are quite a few reasons that you do not want to stand behind a tauralus, the hooves and whip-like tails being the least of them.
332457.sourceDesc:
Drop: Tahonta
Covenant: Necrolord
Zone: Maldraxxus

332460.name: Chosen Tauralus
332460.description: Even an unarmored tauralus is a valuable ally in battle, its enormous horns capable of piercing even plate armor.
332460.sourceDesc:
Achievement: The Gang's All Here
Category: Covenant Sanctums

332462.name: Armored War-Bred Tauralus
332462.description: The tauralus that serve the armies of Maldraxxus have had all traits of compassion bred out of them, and are only adorned in armor when they show that no sword or spell can stop them from carrying their rider to victory.

332464.name: Armored Plaguerot Tauralus
332464.description: When fully armored, a tauralus can take an incredible amount of damage before falling, making it a valuable ally in battle.
332464.sourceDesc:
Covenant: Necrolord
Vendor: Su Zettai
Zone: Maldraxxus
Cost: 3000

332466.name: Armored Bonehoof Tauralus
332466.description: A favored mount of the House of the Chosen, the tauralus only gets more angry and vicious when exposed to battle.
332466.sourceDesc:
Drop: Sabriel the Bonecleaver
Covenant: Necrolord
Zone: Maldraxxus

332467.name: Armored Chosen Tauralus
332467.description: The tauralus has two tails, which are both absolutely necessary for whipping away buzzing pests like the bloodlouse.
332467.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Things To Do When You're Dead
Category: Covenant Sanctums

332478.name: Blisterback Bloodtusk
332478.description: The House of the Chosen train their mounts in all manner of difficult circumstances, so that no matter the battle, they will never falter.

332480.name: Gorespine
332480.description: Nerissa trampled over countless bodies on the back of Gorespine as she rose to prominence as the commander of the Lichsworn forces for the House of Rituals.

332484.name: Lurid Bloodtusk
332484.description: Only bloodtusks that survive the Contest of Conquest are deemed worthy enough to become a mount of the Undying Army.
332484.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Nalcorn Talsen
Zone: Maldraxxus
Faction: The Undying Army - Exalted
Cost: 30000

332882.name: Horrid Dredwing
332882.description: Harika the Horrid terrorized the denizens of the Forest Ward, and with her demise her broodlings can now take this horror to denizens farther afield.
332882.sourceDesc:
Drop: Harika the Horrid
Covenant: Venthyr
Zone: Revendreth

332903.name: Rampart Screecher
332903.description: Roosting among the ramparts of Castle Nathria, these giant dredbats act as sentinels and are trained to take down threats approaching the castle from the air.
332903.sourceDesc:
<span style="color: #FFD200">Achievement: Glory of the Nathria Raider
<span style="color: #FFD200">Category: Dungeons & Raids

332904.name: Harvester's Dredwing
332904.description: The dredwings of the Harvesters fear no mawsworn, and will gleefully sink their teeth into anything that threatens Sinfall.
332904.sourceDesc:
Drop: Harvester's War Chest
Zone: The Maw

332905.name: Endmire Flyer
332905.description: Attracted through portals through which little is known these flying devourers have found a home in the Endmire of Revendreth feeding on the latent anima.
332905.sourceDesc:
Drop: Famu the Infinite
Zone: Revendreth

332923.name: Inquisition Gargon
332923.description: The gargon of the Inquisitors are some of the most vicious ever carved. The Avowed seek to recapture these beasts and return them to the righteous duty of assisting in the purifying of souls rather than the perversions performed at the hands of the Inquisitors.

332927.name: Sinfall Gargon
332927.description: The gargon are the loyal mounts and companions of the Venthyr and Renathal has found many abandoned at Sinfall, awaiting reawakening and assignment to worthy members of the covenant.

332932.name: Crypt Gargon
332932.description: Loyal hounds of the Curator, these gargon patrol the crypts and catacombs deterring both trespassing and escape.

332949.name: Desire's Battle Gargon
332949.description: The Countess maintains a small stable of elegantly adorned gargon mounts for her sole use. Many a rival has been taken in by the finery to their peril as she personally oversees their deadly training.

333021.name: Gravestone Battle Gargon
333021.description: Representative of a new loyal batch of gargon, these battle ready beasts will take Renathal's most loyal compatriots into the final battles against the Jailer.

333023.name: Battle Gargon Silessa
333023.description: Silessa fought valiantly alongside her master in the great incursion by the Light, following the battle her master set her to guard over a vault room of great value.

333027.name: Loyal Gorger
333027.description: Crawling forth from the cracks between the realms, the devourers have a voracious appetite for anima. Little is known of their origins, but all denizens of the Shadowlands see their recent boldness as a sign of the end times.

334352.name: Wildseed Cradle
334352.description: The most precious cargo in all Ardenweald, the wildseeds, are cradled by this lovingly-crafted cart. It is imbued with anima to allow it to hover over the ground.
334352.sourceDesc:
Treasure: Cache of the Moon
Zone: Ardenweald

334364.name: Spinemaw Gladechewer
334364.description: Spriggan riders tie bits of anima-less detritus to the end of sticks in front of their gorm mounts to steer. It's... an imperfect art.

334365.name: Pale Acidmaw
334365.description: The acid present in the ichor of this creature sapped away the color from its shell, leaving it a striking shade of snowy white.
334365.sourceDesc:
Covenant Feature: The Ember Court
Covenant: Venthyr

Covenant Feature: Queen's Conservatory
Covenant: Night Fae

Covenant Feature: Path of Ascension
Covenant: Kyrian

Covenant Feature: Abomination Factory
Covenant: Necrolord

334366.name: Wild Glimmerfur Prowler
334366.description: This prowler's brilliant green coat distinguishes it from the blues and purples of Ardenweald, making it much easier for others of its kind to see through the midnight woods.
334366.sourceDesc:
Drop: Valfir the Unrelenting
Covenant: Night Fae
Zone: Ardenweald

334382.name: Phalynx of Loyalty
334382.description: Some within the Ascended keep a phalynx as a pet. While they may not be as furry as a larion, they are much less likely to eat your other pets.

334386.name: Phalynx of Humility
334386.description: The phalynx does not fetch, though it is not known why this is.

334391.name: Phalynx of Courage
334391.description: A phalynx is considered both a worthy companion and a lithe opponent to test one's reflexes against.

334398.name: Phalynx of Purity
334398.description: Little is known about the origination of phalynx technology, the machinations of which are taught more akin to religion than engineering.

334403.name: Eternal Phalynx of Purity
334403.description: The armored phalynx is a favorite companion of the mightiest warriors of the Ascended as it is both fearless and vicious in battle.

334406.name: Eternal Phalynx of Courage
334406.description: Many bars of gildenite are required to forge one of these sparkling mounts, but the sight of them alone is worth the gathering time.

334408.name: Eternal Phalynx of Loyalty
334408.description: A marvel of steward engineering, the armored phalynx is a rare and awe-inspiring sight.

334409.name: Eternal Phalynx of Humility
334409.description: When an armored phalynx is forged, stewards clap their hammers together in reverence of the skill required in its creation.

334433.name: Silverwind Larion
334433.description: This gift of the silvery winds is only bestowed upon those that search high and low for the wisdom of Bastion.
334433.sourceDesc:
Treasure: Gift of the Silver Wind
Zone: Bastion

334482.name: Restoration Deathwalker
334482.description: With the death of the Jailer and the ascension of a new Arbiter, the Shadowlands is returning to its great Purpose. Some deathwalkers recognize the role that mortal heroes have played, and are willing to serve as mounts.
334482.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Shadowlands Keystone Master: Season Four
Category: Dungeons

336036.name: Marrowfang
336036.description: Marrowfang, Bonefang's progeny, was respected by Amarth the Harvester for her insatiable appetite, even if it disrupted any experiments that the sadistic commander wanted to run.
336036.sourceDesc:
Drop: Nalthor the Rimebinder
Zone: The Necrotic Wake (Mythic)

Drop: Challenger's Cache
Zone: The Necrotic Wake

336038.name: Callow Flayedwing
336038.description: Flayedwings are a necessary force in the cycle of life for the Shadowlands, acting as both prey and predator for the harsh environment of Maldraxxus.

336039.name: Gruesome Flayedwing
336039.description: The flayedwings of Maldraxxus are prized for their ability to soar effortlessly through the skies of the Shadowlands, allowing their rider a surprise opportunity to strike at their foes or support their allies.
336039.sourceDesc:
Covenant Feature: The Ember Court
Covenant: Venthyr

Covenant Feature: Queen's Conservatory
Covenant: Night Fae

Covenant Feature: Path of Ascension
Covenant: Kyrian

Covenant Feature: Abomination Factory
Covenant: Necrolord

336041.name: Bonesewn Fleshroc
336041.description: Only expert flesh-stitchers who have demonstrated mastery over the magics of Maldraxxus are powerful enough to construct a deathroc of this size.

336042.name: Hulking Deathroc
336042.description: Deathrocs are stitched monstrosities from the discarded viscera, bone, and organs that were not required to construct soldiers for the House of Constructs.

336045.name: Predatory Plagueroc
336045.description: Geiger's everlasting hunger is legendary amonst the House of Constructs, and no beast is too large or bony to fit inside its massive stomach.
336045.sourceDesc:
Drop: Gieger
Covenant: Necrolord
Zone: Maldraxxus

336064.name: Dauntless Duskrunner
336064.description: The Path of Ascension is a challenging trial, and those that display all of the facets the Kyrian hold dear will be duly rewarded.
336064.sourceDesc:
Covenant Feature: The Ember Court
Covenant: Venthyr

Covenant Feature: Queen's Conservatory
Covenant: Night Fae

Covenant Feature: Path of Ascension
Covenant: Kyrian

Covenant Feature: Abomination Factory
Covenant: Necrolord

339588.name: Sinrunner Blanchy
339588.description: In life, Blanchy appeared to be an affectionate, well-behaved horse of excellent disposition and appetite. What evils must she have committed in secret to have earned her place among the condemned souls of Revendreth?

339632.name: Arboreal Gulper
339632.description: The wood and foliage growing atop this toad is a natural part of its body, helping it siphon anima from the air to nourish itself.

339956.name: Mawsworn Charger
339956.description: The fate of all horse mounts.
339956.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Flawless Master
Zone: Torghast, Tower of the Damned

339957.name: Hand of Hrestimorak
339957.description: The treachery of Hrestimorak was infamous, betraying his people to claim power. Facing damnation in the Maw, he tried to subvert the Jailer... a foolish act that would earn him an eternity of torment.
339957.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Dominant Raider
Zone: Sanctum of Domination

340068.name: Sintouched Deathwalker
340068.description: Forged from the sins of countless diabolical dungeon denizens. Only those with the skills to overcome them may hold its reins.
340068.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Shadowlands Keystone Master: Season One
Category: Dungeons

340503.name: Umbral Scythehorn
340503.description: Umbral gorm are the most docile of all gorm, but they also grow the largest horns and mandibles. They are probably so docile because other creatures avoid riling them.

341639.name: Court Sinrunner
341639.description: Sinrunners were once the steeds of dark souls, carried in the wake of either their sins or their masters' sins to Revendreth. While some chose to run free, many continue to serve darkness in death as they did in life.
341639.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Mistress Mihaela
Zone: Revendreth
Faction: Court of Harvesters - Exalted
Cost: 30000

341766.name: Warstitched Darkhound
341766.description: These warhounds are crafted by the House of Constructs to carry any rider into the thick of battle, rending and tearing enemy mounts all the while.

341776.name: Highwind Darkmane
341776.description: The Forsworn and their mounts take on a darker aspect upon renouncing the path laid forth by the Archon. While tame enough to ride, the Highwind Darkmane has a fiercely independent streak.

341821.name: Snowstorm
341821.description: He comes from the ice and snow, under the Azeroth sun where adventurers go.

342334.name: Gilded Prowler
342334.description: The mighty larion is an apex predator of Bastion, but that does not stop it from enjoying a nice nap in the sunny fields.
342334.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Adjutant Nikos
Zone: Bastion
Cost: 30000

342335.name: Ascended Skymane
342335.description: Only those that have proven themselves against the combined might of the Ascended will be able to ride this mount.
342335.sourceDesc:
Treasure: Cache of the Ascended
Zone: Bastion

342666.name: Amber Ardenmoth
342666.description: The brilliant orange hue of the amber ardenmoth signals to predators that it is dangerous to eat. Consuming one of these creatures will put a predator into a dreamless sleep for years.
342666.sourceDesc:
Drop: Wild Hunt Supplies
Zone: Ardenweald

342667.name: Vibrant Flutterwing
342667.description: These minty green moths are very friendly. They particularly enjoy having their head fuzz vigorously brushed. They also enjoy music and poetry.

342668.name: Desertwing Hunter
342668.description: In service of the great Purpose, desertwing hunters were designed to fill distant skies of forgotten realms of the Shadowlands.

342671.name: Pale Regal Cervid
342671.description: Looking at these majestic creatures, it's not difficult to see how the idea of cervids developed into the stags found on Azeroth and other mortal worlds.

342678.name: Vespoid Flutterer
342678.description: A flutterer is an overgrown vespoid worker created to carry a rider. Rather than looking to a queen for leadership, it looks to its rider to guide it in all things.

342680.name: Deepstar Aurelid
342680.description: As one of the last remaining polyps of an elusive creature, this aurelid is at home in the water as much as the air.

343550.name: Battle-Hardened Aquilon
343550.description: The aquilon can be a valuable ally in combat, with capabilities exceeding those of the phalynx.
343550.sourceDesc:
Covenant: Kyrian
Vendor: Duchess Mynx
Zone: Korthia
Cost: 1000
Achievement: On the Offensive
Achievement: On the Offensive

344228.name: Battle-Bound Warhound
344228.description: Warhounds find comfort in conflict, and the Contest of Conquest is the perfect place to find these beasts honing their abilities.
344228.sourceDesc:
Drop: Theater of Pain
Zone: Maldraxxus

344574.name: Bulbous Necroray
344574.description: The necrorays of Maldraxxus prefer to congregate around the enormous decaying mushrooms of the region.

344575.name: Pestilent Necroray
344575.description: When a necroray hatches, spores fly everywhere, making a huge mess.

344576.name: Infested Necroray
344576.description: Necrorays lay their eggs in small clusters within the frills and hollows of decaying fungal blooms.

344577.name: Bound Shadehound
344577.description: Created by deciphering and performing powerful runic magic, this Shadehound is bound to its creator.
344577.sourceDesc:
Quest: Feral Shadehound
Zone: The Maw

344578.name: Corridor Creeper
344578.description: The loyal hounds of the Jailer creep along the corridors in search of the scent of souls.
344578.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Twisting Corridors: Layer 8
Category: Torghast

344659.name: Voracious Gorger
344659.description: The devourers are presumed to have their origins in the In-Between, a space between the lands of the Shadowlands that few have explored.
344659.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Shadowlands Hero
Category: Dungeons & Raids

346136.name: Viridian Phase-Hunter
346136.description: Hailing from a species already adept at natural camouflage, the otherworldly energies that transformed Draenor into Outland gave these creatures the ability to shift through space.

346141.name: Slime Serpent
346141.description: This mysterious creature lurks beneath the slime pools of Plaguefall. No one knows where it came from.

346554.name: Tazavesh Gearglider
346554.description: Brokers of all types use these gliders to travel around Tazavesh and similar nearby outposts, and carry their goods as well.
346554.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Fake It 'Til You Make It
Category: Shadowlands Dungeon

346719.name: Serenade
346719.description: These beautiful helicids emerge only at night. When they are pleased, their shells hum with a joyful melody.

347250.name: Lord of the Corpseflies
347250.description: To be the Lord of the Corpseflies, you've got to lay a LOT of eggs.
347250.sourceDesc:
Covenant: Necrolord
Drop: Fleshwing
Zone: Korthia

347251.name: Soaring Razorwing
347251.description: The hide of the razorwing is light, allowing it to fly, but also quite tough, allowing them to survive passage into the Maw.
347251.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Archivist Roh-Suir
Zone: Korthia
Faction: The Archivists' Codex - Tier 6
Cost: 5000

347255.name: Vicious War Croaker
347255.description: These creatures are so enthusiastic when charging into battle that they will croak out something that sounds very much like "FOR THE HORDE!"
347255.sourceDesc:
PvP: Shadowlands: Season 3
Rated Arena and Rated Battleground Season Reward

347256.name: Vicious War Croaker
347256.description: These creatures are so enthusiastic when charging into battle that they will croak out something that sounds very much like "FOR THE ALLIANCE!"
347256.sourceDesc:
PvP: Shadowlands: Season 3
Rated Arena and Rated Battleground Season Reward

347536.name: Tamed Mauler
347536.description: When it comes to taming devourers, all it takes is a little anima and a lot of patience. And a lot of healing potions.
347536.sourceDesc:
Drop: Supplies of the Archivist's Codex
Zone: Korthia

347810.name: Beryl Shardhide
347810.description: These shardhides find it easy to hide in the underbrush, and it is rare to find one that is tamed.
347810.sourceDesc:
Drop: Death's Advance Supplies
Zone: Korthia

347812.name: Sapphire Skyblazer
347812.description: These brilliant blue birds burn brighter (and hotter) than their orange cousins, though the origin of both remains a mystery.

348162.name: Wandering Ancient
348162.description: A staunch defender of the forests of Azeroth, the ancients are also known for their glorious canopies of leaves, which change color with the seasons.

348769.name: Vicious War Gorm
348769.description: The gorm love eating the corpses of your enemies, so this seemed like a natural fit.
348769.sourceDesc:
PvP: Shadowlands: Season 2
Rated Arena and Rated Battleground Season Reward

348770.name: Vicious War Gorm
348770.description: The gorm love eating the corpses of your enemies, so this seemed like a natural fit.
348770.sourceDesc:
PvP: Shadowlands: Season 2
Rated Arena and Rated Battleground Season Reward

349823.name: Vicious Warstalker
349823.description: Trample the Alliance to dust while riding a majestic protoform wolf! For the Horde!
349823.sourceDesc:
PvP: Shadowlands: Season 4
Rated Arena and Rated Battleground Season Reward

349824.name: Vicious Warstalker
349824.description: Trample the Horde to dust while riding a majestic protoform wolf! For the Alliance!
349824.sourceDesc:
PvP: Shadowlands: Season 4
Rated Arena and Rated Battleground Season Reward

349935.name: Noble Bruffalon
349935.description: It is a great honor to be trusted with one of the Maruuk's loyal hunting companions. This Bruffalon is reliable and steadfast through any hardship.
349935.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Storykeeper Ashekh
Zone: The Forbidden Reach
Cost: 100000

350219.name: Magmashell
350219.description: Who's a good little new-forged snail made entirely of elemental lava? You are! Yes, you!
350219.sourceDesc:
Item: Empty Magma Shell
Zone: The Waking Shores

351195.name: Vengeance
351195.description: Sylvanas lost a part of herself the day Arthas took her life, and the darkness within her grew to fill the void.
351195.sourceDesc:
Drop: Lady Sylvanas Windrunner
Zone: Sanctum of Domination
Difficulty: Mythic

352309.name: Hand of Bahmethra
352309.description: The most wicked and cruel of her kin, Bahmethra endured the full measure of the Banished One's punishments before her fall.
352309.sourceDesc:
Drop: Tormentors of Torghast
Zone: The Maw

352441.name: Wild Hunt Legsplitter
352441.description: Integrated into the depleted forces of the Wild Hunt, the fawn riders quickly found that the gorm's powerful mandibles were perfect for cutting down close enemy ranks.
352441.sourceDesc:
Drop: War Chest of the Wild Hunt
Zone: The Maw

352742.name: Undying Darkhound
352742.description: The Undying Darkhound's parts have graced many battlefields, yet this latest battle may have been the first time they all fought together.
352742.sourceDesc:
Drop: War Chest of the Undying Army
Zone: The Maw

352926.name: Skyskin Hornstrider
352926.description: The instability of primalist storms in potential timelines sometimes causes creatures to absorb the energies from the very storms. These creatures tend to be docile towards those who are able to face the fury of these chronomatic anomalies.
352926.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Brendormi
Cost: 150 3000 3000

353036.name: Unchained Gladiator's Soul Eater
353036.description: This soul eater's gaze unnerves you. Best not meet its eyes for too long.
353036.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Shadowlands Season 2
Category: Player vs. Player

353263.name: Cartel Master's Gearglider
353263.description: Only the richest cartel leaders are able to afford the metals required to craft the Cartel Master's Gearglider.
353263.sourceDesc:
Drop: So'leah
Zone: Tazavesh, the Veiled Market

353856.name: Ardenweald Wilderling
353856.description: As anima flows to the distant wealds of Ardenweald once more, the wilderlings awaken and cautiously emerge from their canopy burrows.

353857.name: Autumnal Wilderling
353857.description: The wilderlings are benevolent, magical creatures of Ardenweald, and are drawn to souls that are strong and pure.
353857.sourceDesc:
Covenant: Night Fae
Vendor: Elwyn
Zone: Ardenweald
Cost: 7500

353858.name: Winter Wilderling
353858.description: Wilderlings serve as support units in battle, preserving their allies and rendering enemy magics useless.
353858.sourceDesc:
Covenant: Night Fae
Vendor: Duchess Mynx
Zone: Korthia
Cost: 1000
Achievement: On the Offensive
Achievement: On the Offensive

353859.name: Summer Wilderling
353859.description: Stubborn and rebellious, this wilderling is loyal to very few. But those few are bonded for life.
353859.sourceDesc:
Covenant: Night Fae
Drop: Escaped Wilderling
Zone: Korthia

353866.name: Obsidian Gravewing
353866.description: In the darkened skies of Revendreth, you cannot see these creatures coming until it is too late.
353866.sourceDesc:
Covenant: Venthyr
Vendor: Chachi the Artiste
Zone: Revendreth
Cost: 7500

353872.name: Sinfall Gravewing
353872.description: With anima once again flowing in Sinfall, the Stonewright has been able to infuse these Stoneborn, making them valuable allies in the battles to come.

353873.name: Pale Gravewing
353873.description: Gravewings know no fear and are nearly indestructible -- perfect for an assault on the Maw.
353873.sourceDesc:
Covenant: Venthyr
Vendor: Duchess Mynx
Zone: Korthia
Cost: 1000
Achievement: On the Offensive
Achievement: On the Offensive

353875.name: Elysian Aquilon
353875.description: With anima once again flowing to the Eternal Forge in Bastion, the plans for the aquilon centurion could be crafted once more.

353877.name: Forsworn Aquilon
353877.description: Originally produced by the Forsworn with stolen blueprints, these powerful centurion are now earning a reputation across the Shadowlands.
353877.sourceDesc:
Covenant: Kyrian
Drop: Wild Worldcracker
Zone: Korthia

353880.name: Ascendant's Aquilon
353880.description: The aquilon can rapidly transport aspirants, stewards, and even ascended to a location. Hey, sometimes your wings get tired.
353880.sourceDesc:
Covenant: Kyrian
Vendor: Adjutant Galos
Zone: Bastion
Cost: 7500

353883.name: Maldraxxian Corpsefly
353883.description: Corpseflies were once found throughout Maldraxxus, but many died out in the absence of anima. With anima flowing once again, they swarm.

353884.name: Regal Corpsefly
353884.description: Only the forces of Maldraxxus would call a corpsefly "regal."
353884.sourceDesc:
Covenant: Necrolord
Vendor: Su Zettai
Zone: Maldraxxus
Cost: 7500

353885.name: Battlefield Swarmer
353885.description: Corpseflies are strongly attracted to the smell of dead bodies and will swarm an active battlefield as soon as the first corpse falls.
353885.sourceDesc:
Covenant: Necrolord
Vendor: Duchess Mynx
Zone: Korthia
Cost: 1000
Achievement: On the Offensive
Achievement: On the Offensive

354351.name: Sanctum Gloomcharger
354351.description: Only the Jailer's most powerful lieutenants are gifted these steeds to stalk the halls of the Tower.
354351.sourceDesc:
Drop: The Nine
Zone: Sanctum of Domination

354352.name: Soulbound Gloomcharger
354352.description: Ve'nari has many methods of sneaking around the Maw and disrupting the Jailer's plans, including binding his own minions.
354352.sourceDesc:
Drop: Mysterious Gift from Ve'nari
Zone: The Maw

354353.name: Fallen Charger
354353.description: The charger's screams echo across the Maw as it continues a never-ending ride across the land, forever looking for escape from the endless torments it has been forced to endure.
354353.sourceDesc:
Drop: Fallen Charger
Zone: The Maw

354354.name: Hand of Nilganihmaht
354354.description: Of all the giants who dared defy the Jailer, Nilganihmaht was the most arrogant. For this transgression, the giant's severed hand was hidden within a veil of torments, and the rings that could summon it back were scattered across the Maw.

354355.name: Hand of Salaranga
354355.description: Salaranga was the most cunning of her kin and hid amongst the Beastwarrens. She struck at the Banished One with a horde of bestial allies. It did not matter.
354355.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Breaking the Chains
Zone: Korthia and The Maw

354356.name: Amber Shardhide
354356.description: The bright colors of Korthian wildlife indicate that they have either few predators, or are tough enough to fight back.
354356.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Duchess Mynx
Zone: Korthia
Faction: Death's Advance - Revered
Cost: 5000

354357.name: Crimson Shardhide
354357.description: When Korthia was pulled into the maw, only a few hardy species survived.

354358.name: Darkmaul
354358.description: An older shardhide, Darkmaul was relatively tame and friendly around Korthians. He was thought lost to the calamity.

354359.name: Fierce Razorwing
354359.description: Razorwings generally stay away from other Korthian species, but with time and patience, they can be tamed as well.
354359.sourceDesc:
Drop: Death's Advance Supplies
Zone: Korthia

354360.name: Garnet Razorwing
354360.description: Korthia was once known for its bright red flowers. Several species were known for consuming or rolling in them, and taking on bright red coloration as a result.
354360.sourceDesc:
Drop: Reliwik the Defiant
Zone: Korthia

354361.name: Dusklight Razorwing
354361.description: Razorwings can be seen throughout Korthia, making their nests on high hills and in trees.

354362.name: Maelie, the Wanderer
354362.description: A curious and inquisitive doe, she doesn't mean to worry her master, she just gets distracted easily. Especially with all of the new things to see on Korthia.

356488.name: Sarge's Tale
356488.description: Hold on a sec, Sarge isn't that large, someone must have spun a tall tale in the Hearthstone Tavern...

356501.name: Rampaging Mauler
356501.description: One would think controlling a rampaging mount would be difficult, but if you can learn to control the direction of the rampage it can be quite useful.
356501.sourceDesc:
Drop: Konthrogz the Obliterator
Zone: Korthia

358319.name: Soultwisted Deathwalker
358319.description: A howling vortex of tormented souls, ridden only by those who wish to demonstrate their impressive tolerance for pain and suffering.
358319.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Shadowlands Keystone Master: Season Two
Category: Dungeons

359013.name: Val'sharah Hippogryph
359013.description: These majestic hippogryphs are as close to a being of the Emerald Dream as any resident of Azeroth can be, and do not bond with a rider easily.
359013.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Aridormi
Zone: Dalaran
Cost: 5000

359229.name: Heartlight Vombata
359229.description: The Enlightened revere all creations of the First Ones, yet for many, the vombata of Zereth Mortis are the most beloved. These creatures are equal parts trusted beast of burden and beloved companion.
359229.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Vilo
Zone: Zereth Mortis
Faction: The Enlightened - Exalted
Cost: 5000

359230.name: Curious Crystalsniffer
359230.description: Most vombata enjoy tunneling through the ground, but these sniffers seem to have an unerring ability to locate crystals buried deep underground and will congregate around large deposits.

359231.name: Darkened Vombata
359231.description: The schematic to synthesize these darkened vombata seem to have appeared as a reaction to the Mawsworn invasion. The resulting vombata look different--darker, much like the invaders--but behave normally.

359232.name: Adorned Vombata
359232.description: Red-colored vombata are considered lucky by the Enlightened. It was a red vombata that was present when they first arrived in Zereth Mortis.

359276.name: Anointed Protostag
359276.description: Only those most esteemed by the Enlightened are trusted with the reins of this rare cervid.
359276.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Vilo
Zone: Zereth Mortis
Faction: The Enlightened - Revered
Cost: 5000

359277.name: Sundered Zerethsteed
359277.description: Whatever the purpose of these cervids once was, it is long forgotten. Though they are not Dominated, they have been corrupted by the unintended presence of Mawsworn in the sacred realm of Zereth Mortis.

359278.name: Deathrunner
359278.description: These wild cervids are only truly at peace when running through--or between--the lands of Death.

359317.name: Wen Lo, the River's Edge
359317.description: The rivers of Pandaria, like Wen Lo, are unpredictable in nature. They may remain calm, bringing water to the crops, or flood, bringing ruin. Wen Lo reminds us that we must adapt to the challenges of life.

359318.name: Soaring Spelltome
359318.description: In the forgotten depths of the Dalaran library, this oversized tome was found flapping madly around the room. Open the pages of this arcane-infused book and hitch a ride to magical adventure.
359318.sourceDesc:
Achievement: A Tour of Towers
Category: Timewalking

359364.name: Bronzewing Vespoid
359364.description: Bronzewing vespoids are the result of attempting to synthesize a vespoid queen with no other members of a new hive. While no mortal has yet discovered how to synthesize a hive, the bronzewings are reliable mounts just as they are.

359366.name: Buzz
359366.description: Buzz buzz buzz, buzz buzz! Buzz buzz buzz buzz buzz. Buzz buzz buzz, buzz buzz buzz.

359367.name: Forged Spiteflyer
359367.description: There's nothing that can make you feel as alive quite like riding through the realm of Death while atop a being that hates you.

359372.name: Mawdapted Raptora
359372.description: Since the Jailer's incursion, new raptora have been synthesized by Zereth Mortis that are capable of resisting the corrupting influence of the Maw.

359373.name: Raptora Swooper
359373.description: The raptora swooper is one of the most vicious iterations of its kind, perfectly suited for its ecological niche. Needing no further adjustments, the ones synthesized today are identical to those created in the past.

359376.name: Bronze Helicid
359376.description: Some helicids of Zereth Mortis have strangely metallic shells. The ones who do are generally a bronze color, indistinct from the metal any novice miner could work, save that this creature's construction far surpasses the skill of any novice.

359377.name: Unsuccessful Prototype Fleetpod
359377.description: This creature was not designed by the First Ones, but instead by an unknown being attempting to create a very fast runner. Needless to say the attempt failed, because this mount is very slow.

359378.name: Scarlet Helicid
359378.description: This helicid's unusual reddish tint is clearly intentional in its design, but the only other difference between these and other helicids is the unusual lack of any ooze.

359379.name: Shimmering Aurelid
359379.description: Though it was once created to defend the Sepulcher of the First Ones, with its primary function now completed, it now obediently follows your command.
359379.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Sepulcher Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

359381.name: Cryptic Aurelid
359381.description: The Cyphers of the First Ones are beyond any mortal understanding. A curious effect of the language is that, for reasons unknown, some aurelids are drawn to mortals who aspire to unlock its mystery.
359381.sourceDesc:
Achievement: From A to Zereth
Category: Shadowlands

359401.name: Genesis Crawler
359401.description: The Enlightened who have observed tarachnids believe that this variety may be some of the first beings to ever walk the land of Zereth Mortis.

359402.name: Tarachnid Creeper
359402.description: These tarachnids make their home in the darkest corners of Zereth Mortis, coming out only to hunt (or, sometimes, carry a rider around).

359403.name: Ineffable Skitterer
359403.description: These tarachnids move with a purpose unknown to others, answering only to a higher calling. Whatever that may be, it appears to include routine assistance to mortals who need a ride. For now.

359407.name: Wastewarped Deathwalker
359407.description: Raw swirling energy bound together into a cohesive form, it will only bend to the will of those strong enough to bind it.
359407.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Shadowlands Keystone Master: Season Three
Category: Dungeons

359409.name: Iskaara Trader's Ottuk
359409.description: There are no guarantees when you purchase an ottuk from Tattukiaka. At least they're cute.
359409.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Tattukiaka
Zone: The Azure Span
Cost: 1 1 1

359413.name: Goldplate Bufonid
359413.description: This armored bufonid is always ready to leap into battle... as long as that battle is really, really close. In a pinch, it can leap multiple times and eventually reach the battle.

359545.name: Carcinized Zerethsteed
359545.description: The few of these mysterious creatures that remain appear to be impossibly old, almost timeless. Perhaps they were created by the First Ones, because no schematic to synthesize these has yet been discovered.

359622.name: Liberated Slyvern
359622.description: It's difficult to tell because it's far too angry, but this slyvern is actually glad it's not owned by gnolls anymore.
359622.sourceDesc:
Drop: Breezebiter
Zone: The Azure Span

359843.name: Tangled Dreamweaver
359843.description: The last of the sleepers are finally awakening, bringing the dreams of the dragons back to the lands.

360954.name: Highland Drake
360954.description: The drakes of Azure Span follow a strict personal code of honor as they explore the isles anew.

363136.name: Colossal Ebonclaw Mawrat
363136.description: This vicious and cunning creature has grown to its astonishing size by not only feasting upon the weakened souls in the Jailer's Tower, but also vulnerable Mawsworn.
363136.sourceDesc:
Achievement: The Jailer's Gauntlet: Layer 4
Category: Torghast

363178.name: Colossal Umbrahide Mawrat
363178.description: This disturbingly large Mawrat is an anomaly amongst its species. These Colossal Mawrats lurk only in the most distant and darkest reaches of Torghast.
363178.sourceDesc:
Drop: Torghast Layers 13 or higher
Location: Torghast

363297.name: Colossal Soulshredder Mawrat
363297.description: The incredible prowess you have demonstrated within the Jailer's Tower has instilled sufficient respect into this fearsome creature, enabling its use as a mount.

363613.name: Lightforged Ruinstrider
363613.description: A loyal steed to the Lightforged Draenei.

363701.name: Patient Bufonid
363701.description: Some bufonids will sit perfectly still for hours or days at a time if left to their own devices. Fortunately, they're also quite agreeable if a rider would like to move more often than that.
363701.sourceDesc:
Quest: The Patient Bufonid
Zone: Zereth Mortis

363703.name: Prototype Leaper
363703.description: An ancient schematic allows for the instantiation of this early, but functional, bufonid design.

363706.name: Russet Bufonid
363706.description: Russet is a rare color among bufonids that is normally only seen on specimens that are tainted by other cosmic forces, or synthesized from a perplexing schematic that invokes that color.

365559.name: Cosmic Gladiator's Soul Eater
365559.description: This soul eater's gaze unnerves you. Best not meet its eyes for too long.
365559.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Shadowlands Season 3
Category: Player vs. Player

366647.name: Magenta Cloud Serpent
366647.description: More affectionate than their cousins, Magenta Cloud Serpents are known to form close bonds with their riders.

366789.name: Crusty Crawler
366789.description: This rare giant crab has taken a break from its nautical nonsense deep under the sea to explore the surface.

366790.name: Quawks
366790.description: Squawks's older (and somehow louder) brother appears to tolerate your presence. For now. You should probably track down some crackers while you still can.

366791.name: Jigglesworth Sr.
366791.description: It's unclear how the saddle stays atop this formerly feline friend, but somehow the House of Plagues made it work. Science.
366791.sourceDesc: Achievement: Fates of the Shadowlands Raids

366962.name: Ash'adar, Harbinger of Dawn
366962.description: Kaldorei legends whisper of a relentless hunter prowling amongst the deepest shadows of Kalimdor, never sleeping. By the light of the sun or the moon, Ash'adar now hunts with you.

367190.name: [DND] Test Mount JZB
367190.sourceDesc: Vendor: Uncle Bigpocket Zone: Kun-Lai Summit Cost: 120000

367620.name: Coral-Stalker Waveray
367620.description: This species of ray seems to have evolved to stalk its prey amidst the brightly colored corals of the seas.

367673.name: Heartbond Lupine
367673.description: From the moment of its creation, this packless lupine has held nothing more than deepest affection and loyalty towards you.

367676.name: Nether-Gorged Greatwyrm
367676.description: Few mana wyrms find sufficiently stable sources of arcane power to reach such a size. A greatwyrm's appetite for mana is unmatched.

367826.name: Savage Green Battle Turtle
367826.description: Turtle too slow to chase down your foes? Just add cannons. Nothing can outrun a cannon.

367875.name: Armored Siege Kodo
367875.description: Only the strongest and most fearless of kodos can be trained to become living siege weapons. Even the highest walls won't keep them out for long.

368105.name: Colossal Plaguespew Mawrat
368105.description: These rodents became Iska's infamous sentries, scouting and carrying her plague across the Maw. Their presence is only followed by ruin.

368126.name: Armored Golden Pterrordax
368126.description: Many an unwary direhorn has met its end in a flash of glittering gold before becoming this pterrordax's next meal.

368128.name: Colossal Wraithbound Mawrat
368128.description: Infused by the energies of tormented souls, these creatures have adopted ghostlike abilities that make them quite elusive.

368158.name: Zereth Overseer
368158.description: Enigmatic and aloof, this construct of the First Ones flies on a graceful stream of perfect geometric understanding.
368158.sourceDesc:
Drop: The Jailer
Zone: Sepulcher of the First Ones
Difficulty: Mythic

368893.name: Winding Slitherdrake
368893.description: These drakes feel at home in the depths of the earth and the far reaches of the sky.

368896.name: Renewed Proto-Drake
368896.description: As the isles awaken, these proto-drakes answer the call to soar the skies alongside mortals.
368896.sourceDesc: <span style="color: #FFD200">Achievement: Dragon Isles: A New Friend

368899.name: Windborne Velocidrake
368899.description: The long talons of the velocidrake give it an edge on the plains.

368901.name: Cliffside Wylderdrake
368901.description: Often roosting along the steep cliff faces of Thaldraszus, they're swift to the skies in times of danger.

369451.name: Jade, Bright Foreseer
369451.description: The presence of this majestic Pandaren rabbit spirit brings joy and happiness and is heralded as a wonderful omen. Legend says that in its eyes, you can glimpse the greatest happiness of your life, even if it is yet to come.

369476.name: Amalgam of Rage
369476.description: The fearsome beast ridden by Astaroth himself is now yours to command.

369480.name: Cerulean Marsh Hopper
369480.description: Gottum's expansion into export markets was inevitable with news of the Trading Post reaching even into the depths of the Frogmarsh.

369666.name: Grimhowl
369666.description: Otherwise known as The Flame Woof, the Fetcher of the Igneous, Molten Core's Best Friend, Forgehound Maximus, the Best Fiery Boy, and "oh no is that an AXE on his face!?"
369666.sourceDesc:
Quest: Good Fiery Boy
Zone: Blackrock Depths

370346.name: Eternal Gladiator's Soul Eater
370346.description: This soul eater's gaze unnerves you. Best not meet its eyes for too long.
370346.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Shadowlands Season 4
Category: Player vs. Player

370620.name: Elusive Emerald Hawkstrider
370620.description: Unseen for many years, this brightly hued hawkstrider emerged from hiding to help defend the Ghostlands from the Scourge. Its prowess shines as brilliantly as its feathers.
370620.sourceDesc:
Quest: Blood Knight
Zone: Ghostlands

Quest: Victory for the Sin'dorei
Zone: Ghostlands

370770.name: Tuskarr Shoreglider
370770.description: The Tuskarr learned long ago that some of the bones of the sea creatures they hunted were light and buoyant, making for effective glider materials.

371176.name: Subterranean Magmammoth
371176.description: Awakened from a long slumber, this beast has yet to see the light of day.
371176.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Sacratros
Zone: Zaralek Cavern
Cost: 100

372995.name: Swift Spectral Drake
372995.description: Even the dead need a lift every now and then.

373859.name: Loyal Magmammoth
373859.description: Liberated from the Qalashi and harnessed by your ingenuity (and your harness), this magmammoth is ready to lava stomp wherever you want to go.
373859.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Yries Lightfingers
Zone: The Waking Shores

374032.name: Tamed Skitterfly
374032.description: It didn't take long for Granpap Whiskers to tame the skitterflies around the Dragonscale Basecamp and set them to helping move Expedition personnel and cargo.
374032.sourceDesc:
Faction: Dragonscale Expedition
Renown: 25
Vendor: Granpap Whiskers
Location: Dragonscale Basecamp

374034.name: Azure Skitterfly
374034.description: Once Granpap Whiskers finally taught them how to take riders, the azure skitterflies proved to bond closely and loyally to their riders.
374034.sourceDesc:
Faction: Dragonscale Expedition
Renown: 25
Vendor: Granpap Whiskers
Location: Dragonscale Basecamp
Cost: 5 20 750 750 20 750 750

374048.name: Verdant Skitterfly
374048.description: Verdant skitterflies are the perfect mount for the scouts of the Dragonscale Expedition scouts, as they are fast and blend into the foliage of the Dragon Isles.
374048.sourceDesc:
Faction: Dragonscale Expedition
Renown: 25
Treasure: Expedition Scout's Pack

374090.name: Ancient Salamanther
374090.description: Due to their preference for dark caves and murky waters, sightings of this unique breed of salamanther are so rare that many researchers thought they had gone extinct.

374098.name: Stormhide Salamanther
374098.description: Sometimes when storm energies infuse a creature, it simply... becomes larger and more placid. Few salamanthers are willing to be ridden, but these children of the storm are a notable exception.

374138.name: Seething Slug
374138.description: Drawn forth from its abyss by the rage of the Zaqali.
374138.sourceDesc:
Treasure: Seething Cache
Zone: Zaralek Cavern

374155.name: Shellack
374155.description: Fed by victory and hardened by glory, this snail is nothing less than a tribute to mastery.
374155.sourceDesc: Achievement: Glory of the Dragonflight Hero

374157.name: Gooey Snailemental
374157.description: Formed from the leftover elemental energies of the Primal Storms, this magical mollusk is faster than it appears.

374162.name: Scrappy Worldsnail
374162.description: For the Worldbreakers, a portable footstool. For you, a hardy mount.
374162.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Dealer Vexil
Zone: The Waking Shores
Cost: 1000

374194.name: Mossy Mammoth
374194.description: Preserved for thousands of years in stone, bronze magic has nearly aged this mammoth back into a fossil.

374196.name: Plainswalker Bearer
374196.description: The mammoths of the Ohn'ahran Plains are unaccustomed to carrying people, as their centaur neighbors do not typically ride mounts. They can learn to bear riders, however. Some even do so enthusiastically.
374196.sourceDesc: <span style="color: #FFD200">World Event: Centaur Hunts (first hunt of each week)

374247.name: Lizi, Thunderspine Tramper
374247.description: Nothing will stop Lizi from her mission to eat all the world's fruit.
374247.sourceDesc:
Quest: To Tame A Thunderspine
Zone: Ohn'ahran Plains

374275.name: Raging Magmammoth
374275.description: Most lava flows. This lava charges.
374275.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Glory of the Vault Raider
Category: Dungeons & Raids

376873.name: Otto
376873.description: Relax. The future will unfold as it was meant to, one way or an otter.
376873.sourceDesc: Quest: The Way to an Otto's Heart

376875.name: Brown Scouting Ottuk
376875.description: Wily and playful in their natural habitat, ottuks possess keen eyes that can scout far afield as ably as they watch for predators.
376875.sourceDesc:
Faction: Iskaara Tuskarr
Renown: 25
Vendor: Tatto
Location: Iskaara
Cost: 2 2 750 750 2 750 750

376879.name: Ivory Trader's Ottuk
376879.description: No adult knows why some ottuks are white, but any tuskarr child can tell you: it's because they eat too much snow.
376879.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Tattukiaka
Zone: The Azure Span
Cost: 1 1 1 1 1 1 1

376880.name: Yellow Scouting Ottuk
376880.description: The yellow scouting ottuk love to hide and they blend in well to their surroundings. When not 'playing' hide and seek with their riders, they are perfect companions when scouting enemy encampments.
376880.sourceDesc:
Faction: Iskaara Tuskarr
Renown: 25
Vendor: Tatto
Location: Iskaara
Cost: 2 2 750 750 2 750 750

376910.name: Brown War Ottuk
376910.description: The tuskarr of Iskaara are loathe to war against anyone, but many tuskarr and their allies have nonetheless taken up the spear with a war ottuk beside them.
376910.sourceDesc:
Faction: Iskaara Tuskarr
Renown: 30
Vendor: Tatto
Location: Iskaara
Cost: 5 5 1000 1000 5 1000 1000

376912.name: Otterworldly Ottuk Carrier
376912.description: Some ottuks get into the spirit of carrying people around more than others.
376912.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Thanks for the Carry!
Category: Mounts

376913.name: Yellow War Ottuk
376913.description: The yellow ottuks of the Azure Span are sleek, sneaky, and smart. Those trained for war are the finest tuskarr cavalry mounts, equally capable on the ground and in the waters.
376913.sourceDesc:
Faction: Iskaara Tuskarr
Renown: 30
Vendor: Tatto
Location: Iskaara
Cost: 5 5 1000 1000 5 1000 1000

377071.name: Crimson Gladiator's Drake
377071.description: Forged in the fires of conquest, and armored to the teeth.
377071.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Dragonflight Season 1
Category: Player vs. Player

381529.name: Telix the Stormhorn
381529.description: Once a simple beetle of the Forbidden Reach, Telix became infused with storm magic when Raszageth was unleashed. With its newly heightened senses, Telix roams the Dragon Isles alongside the Dragonscale Expedition--and you!

384963.name: Guardian Vorquin
384963.description: Trained using ancient dracthyr methods, these armored vorquin are the pinnacle of tactical mounted ground warfare.
384963.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Treysh
Zone: The Forbidden Reach
Cost: 80

Vendor: Tethalash
Zone: Valdrakken
Cost: 80

385115.name: Majestic Armored Vorquin
385115.description: Trained using ancient dracthyr methods, these armored vorquin are the pinnacle of tactical mounted ground warfare.
385115.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Treysh
Zone: The Forbidden Reach
Cost: 80

Vendor: Tethalash
Zone: Valdrakken
Cost: 80

385131.name: Armored Vorquin Leystrider
385131.description: Trained using ancient dracthyr methods, these armored vorquin are the pinnacle of tactical mounted ground warfare.
385131.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Treysh
Zone: The Forbidden Reach
Cost: 80

Vendor: Tethalash
Zone: Valdrakken
Cost: 80

385134.name: Swift Armored Vorquin
385134.description: Trained using ancient dracthyr methods, these armored vorquin are the pinnacle of tactical mounted ground warfare.
385134.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Treysh
Zone: The Forbidden Reach
Cost: 80

Vendor: Tethalash
Zone: Valdrakken
Cost: 80

385266.name: Zenet Hatchling
385266.description: The hardest winds begin with a gust and a flap.
385266.sourceDesc:
Drop: Zenet Egg
Zone: Ohn'ahran Plains

385738.name: Temperamental Skyclaw
385738.description: Slyverns are rarely comfortable acting as mounts. Only those willing to feed their gluttonous appetites and keep a careful eye on them should attempt to ride.
385738.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Zon'Wogi
Zone: The Azure Span

386452.name: Frostbrood Proto-Wyrm
386452.description: The same magic of undeath that raised the Frostbrood into the Lich King's service has infused this primal wyrm. Its loyalty and ferocity now serve those who defend Azeroth.
386452.sourceDesc: Promotion: Wrath of the Lich King Classic

387231.name: Hailstorm Armoredon
387231.description: Born in the middle of an ice storm, this armoredon prefers its meals partially frozen.
387231.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Dragonflight Keystone Master: Season One
Category: Dungeons

394216.name: Crimson Vorquin
394216.description: Respected for their resilience in battle, even against dragonfire, these noble beasts are the prized mounts of the dracthyr cavalry.
394216.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Treysh
Zone: The Forbidden Reach
Cost: 40

Vendor: Tethalash
Zone: Valdrakken
Cost: 40

394218.name: Sapphire Vorquin
394218.description: Respected for their resilience in battle, even against dragonfire, these noble beasts are the prized mounts of the dracthyr cavalry.
394218.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Treysh
Zone: The Forbidden Reach
Cost: 40

Vendor: Tethalash
Zone: Valdrakken
Cost: 40

394219.name: Bronze Vorquin
394219.description: Respected for their resilience in battle, even against dragonfire, these noble beasts are the prized mounts of the dracthyr cavalry.
394219.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Treysh
Zone: The Forbidden Reach
Cost: 40

Vendor: Tethalash
Zone: Valdrakken
Cost: 40

394220.name: Obsidian Vorquin
394220.description: Respected for their resilience in battle, even against dragonfire, these noble beasts are the prized mounts of the dracthyr cavalry.
394220.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Treysh
Zone: The Forbidden Reach
Cost: 40

Vendor: Tethalash
Zone: Valdrakken
Cost: 40

394737.name: Vicious Sabertooth
394737.description: The elite Alliance forces that use these sabertooth mounts use a battle cry that translates from Darnassian as "here kitty kitty".
394737.sourceDesc:
PvP: Dragonflight: Season 1
Rated Arena and Rated Battleground Season Reward

394738.name: Vicious Sabertooth
394738.description: The elite Horde forces that use these sabertooth mounts use a battle cry that translates from Thalassian as "pspspspsps".
394738.sourceDesc:
PvP: Dragonflight: Season 1
Rated Arena and Rated Battleground Season Reward

395644.name: Divine Kiss of Ohn'ahra
395644.description: ...as though welcomed by the wind itself.
395644.sourceDesc:
Quest: A Whispering Breeze
Zone: Ohn'ahran Plains

400733.name: Rocket Shredder 9001
400733.description: The salesgoblin always tells people about the RS-9001's huge variety of attachments, but somehow neglects to mention that you never get to pick the attachments it'll have when you mount up.

406637.name: Inferno Armoredon
406637.description: Its tail smells like campfire but its breath smells like brimstone.
406637.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Dragonflight Keystone Master: Season Two
Category: Dungeons

407555.name: Tarecgosa's Visage
407555.description: "Farewell, Tarecgosa. A dear sister, hero, student, and teacher. Though blood does not bind us, you will always be family. May your soul find its place soaring among the stars."

408313.name: Big Slick in the City
408313.description: Big heart, big dreams, Big Slick.
408313.sourceDesc:
Quest: Snailed It
Zone: Zaralek Cavern

408627.name: Igneous Shalewing
408627.description: You'd be forgiven for mistaking this creature for a flying volcanic rock. Because to some extent, it is.
408627.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Saccratros
Zone: Zaralek Cavern
Cost: 400

408647.name: Cobalt Shalewing
408647.description: Brood of Kairoktra, raised in the underlight of Zaralek Cavern.

408649.name: Shadowflame Shalewing
408649.description: Born from the magma, its carapace was originally molten blobs cooled to form dark-colored volcanic rock. Being imbued by shadowflame has only solidified its unbreakable nature.
408649.sourceDesc: <span style="color: #FFD200">Achievement: Glory of the Aberrus Raider

408651.name: Cataloged Shalewing
408651.description: The first instance of a flaming shalewing ever discovered. Nine out of ten researchers agree: it's hot!
408651.sourceDesc:
Zone: Zaralek Cavern
Public Event: Researchers Under Fire

408653.name: Boulder Hauler
408653.description: These shalewings have been specially trained to carry large amounts of Barter Boulders for the niffen's bartering activities.
408653.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Ponzo
Zone: Zaralek Cavern
Cost: 85

408655.name: Morsel Sniffer
408655.description: A breed of shalewings trained by the niffen to find the deepest of morsels.
408655.sourceDesc:
Vendor: Harlowe Marl
Zone: Zaralek Cavern
Cost: 800

408977.name: Obsidian Gladiator's Slitherdrake
408977.description: This mischievous drake enjoys flying through geysers and volcanic plumes.
408977.sourceDesc:
Achievement: Gladiator: Dragonflight Season 2
Category: Player vs. Player

409032.name: Vicious War Snail
409032.description: The Horde uses these ravenous snail mounts to traverse over any obstacle in battlefields.
409032.sourceDesc:
PvP: Dragonflight: Season 2
Rated Arena and Rated Battleground Season Reward

409034.name: Vicious War Snail
409034.description: The Alliance uses these ravenous snail mounts to traverse over any obstacle in battlefields.
409034.sourceDesc:
PvP: Dragonflight: Season 2
Rated Arena and Rated Battleground Season Reward

411565.name: Felcrystal Scorpion
411565.description: The results of a fel infusion experiment with one of Skorpyron's offspring.

414986.name: Royal Swarmer
414986.description: These drones will swarm anyone who dares approach their queen uninvited.
